HOW DO THEY KNOW SUCH PRECISE LOCATIONS FROM THE HUGE CASTLES TO THE SMALLEST HOLDS

EACH GENERALLY ONLY KNOWS ONE HOME LOCATION THEN THEY'RE TAKEN IN CAGES ALONG WITH OTHER SUPPLIES IN CARAVANS SO THAT WHEN THEY'RE RELEASED WITH A MESSAGE ELSEWHERE THEY JUST FLY THAT MESSAGE HOME

SO YOU CAN ONLY SEND A RAVEN TO THE EXTENT YOU HAVE THE RIGHT ONES IN YOUR ROOKERY FOR THE DESTINATION AND I IMAGINE RAVENS GOING TO THE SMALLEST HOLDS ARE MOSTLY ONLY KEPT AT THE CASTLE DIRECTLY ABOVE THEM IN THE HIERARCHY

I'VE PREVIOUSLY GIVEN MY ANALYSIS OF THE BATTLE AND THE REASONS WHY IT HAD TO HAPPEN AND WHY BOTH SIDES HAD TERRIBLE STRATEGIES WHAT I NEVER GOT AROUND TO WAS A SUGGESTION FOR AN ALTERNATIVE STRATEGY THAT COULD HAVE BEEN USED I'M PLANNING ON DOING SO IN DETAIL IN THE NEAR FUTURE SO HERE'S A SUMMARY OF WHAT I THINK JON SHOULD HAVE DONE

JON SHOULD HAVE PUSHED HIS LINES FORWARD SO THAT HIS ARCHERS WERE ON TOP OF THE TWO RISES AND HIS INFANTRY IN THE GAP BETWEEN THEM THIS NOT ONLY ALLOWS HIS ARCHERS TO SEE THE ENEMY BUT GIVES THEM A RANGE ADVANTAGE WHICH THEY'LL LIKELY NEED DUE TO HOW MANY OF THEM HAVE BOWS

2 IN FRONT AND TO THE SIDES OF HIS POSITION JON SHOULD HAVE ERECTED SOME KIND OF BARRICADE PERHAPS THIS WOULD TAKE THE FORM OF A SERIES OF STAKES OR IF THE GROUND WAS TOO HARD PERHAPS THREE OF THOSE STAKES LASHED TOGETHER TO FORM A BARRICADE IF POSSIBLE HIDDEN TRENCHES OR POTHOLES FORWARD OF THE BARRICADE

THE MEN IN THE FRONT OF HIS RANKS SHOULD HAVE LARGE WICKER SHIELDS COVERED IN LEATHER LAYERS OF LINEN OR RAWHIDE IN ORDER TO PROTECT THEM FROM ARROWS THE SOLDIERS BEHIND SHOULD HAVE BEEN ARMED WITH LONG STAKES PREFERABLY PIKES

CAVALRY AND WUN WUN WHO HAS A CLUB SHOULD HAVE BEEN IN THE WOODS ON EITHER SIDE OF HIS POSITION READY TO SPRING AN AMBUSH READING THROUGH BOTH MEDIEVAL AND CENTURY ACCOUNTS IT BECOMES CLEAR THAT SURPRISE CHARGES ROUTINELY ROUT MUCH LARGER FORCES IF ONLY TEMPORARILY

HOW THE BATTLE PLAYS OUT

DUE TO HIS DEFENCES JON NEVER MANAGES TO CHARGE OUT TO SAVE RECKON DAVOS AND ANSA HAVE TIME TO CATCH HIM AND BRING HIM BACK INTO LINE BUT ONLY AFTER JON NEARLY KILLS DAVOS AND THREATENS HIS MEN IN AN ATTEMPT TO GET THROUGH THEM MORE QUICKLY RAMSAY IS DISAPPOINTED AND KILLS RECKON IN FRONT OF THE WHOLE ARMY

IMPATIENT RAMSEY SENDS HIS CAVALRY IN NEXT BUT THEY'RE BROUGHT UP SHORT BY DEFENCES AND BEGIN TO LOSE MEN AND HORSES TO HIS ARCHERS AT A SIGNAL FROM DAVOS JON STILL BEING WORKED UP A HUNDRED AND FIFTY CAVALRY RIDING KNEE TO KNEE COME FROM THE RIGHT AND FIFTY CAVALRY AND WUN WUN COME IN CLOSE FORMATION FROM THE RIGHT THE BOLTON CAVALRY DISORGANISED BECAUSE OF THEIR FAILED CHARGE AND THE LARGE NUMBER OF THEM COMPARED TO FORCE AND HAVING FORMED A ROILING SEA OF MEN AND HORSES ARE UNABLE TO REACT IN TIME AND AFTER THE FIRST SHOCK ROUT THEY'RE BROUGHT BACK UNDER CONTROL EVENTUALLY BUT RAMSAY SENDS HIS ARCHERS AND INFANTRY INTO BATTLE OUT OF DISGUST

THE ARCHERS ADVANCE FORWARD OF THE BOLTON HEAVY INFANTRY SMALLJON AND LORD KARSTARK HAVE YET TO BE SEEN AND RAMSAY GIVES A LITTLE SMIRK

ARCHERS ENTER INTO A DUEL WITH AND TAKE A DISPROPORTIONATE NUMBER OF CASUALTIES DUE TO USE OF SHIELDS AND THE ELEVATION OF HIS ARCHERS THEY DO HOWEVER CAUSE A LARGE NUMBER OF CASUALTIES ON SIDE BEFORE THEY RETREAT AND THE PIKEMEN ADVANCE

UNDER COVER OF A LINE OF BRAVE SHIELD BEARERS AND A FEW ARCHERS THE DITCH IS FILLED WITH CORPSES AND THE INFANTRY ADVANCES THE SHIELD BEARERS TEARING DOWN THE BARRICADES AND BEGINNING TO ENGAGE WITH PIKEMEN WHO ARE NOT PARTICULARLY GOOD

A WILDLING SUDDENLY RUNS UP TO JON AND TELLS HIM THAT THERE ARE ENEMIES BEHIND HIM JON MANAGES TO FORM THE DISMOUNTED CAVALRY WHO REJOINED HIM AFTER THEIR CHARGE INTO A DEFENSIVE LINE JUST BEFORE LORD KARSTARK AND SMALLJON BRING THEIR LIGHT INFANTRY INTO PLAY ATTACKING FROM THE WOODS JON FINDS HIMSELF PRESSED FROM FRONT AND REAR AND HIS SITUATION APPEARS HOPELESS HE REALISES THAT HE CAN'T SEE ANSA AND PANICS

A SOUND LIKE THUNDER HAS BEEN IN THE BACKGROUND FOR A WHILE NOW BUT IT'S ONLY JUST NOW FULLY AUDIBLE TO US AND TO JON WHO GETS CLEAR OF THE BATTLE LINE AND LOOKS TOWARDS WHERE THE BOLTON CAVALRY SHOULD BE IRRATIONALLY FEARING A CHARGE INSTEAD HE IS IN TIME TO SEE THE KNIGHTS OF THE VALE HIT BARELY FORMED CAVALRY LANCES LOWERED ANOTHER DETACHMENT OF CAVALRY COMES INTO VIEW AROUND THE RISE TO LEFT AND TRUMPETS SOUNDING HIT HEAVY INFANTRY IN THE REAR THE INFANTRY HAS TRIED TO REFORM TO MEET THE CHARGE BUT ARE UNABLE TO FULLY MEET IT AND THE KOTA HAVE PEYTRALS WHICH LARGELY PROTECT THEIR HORSES THE BOLTON HEAVY INFANTRY ROUT FROM THEIR LEFT FREE UP REMAINING INFANTRY TO FOCUS ON SMALLJON AND KARSTARK

JON MEANWHILE MOUNTS ONE OF THE FEW SURVIVING HORSES WITH A COMBINATION OF ARCHERS AND MEN AT ARMS AND HAS WUN WUN CLEAR A PATH FOR THEM SOMEONE HANDS HIM STARK BANNER AND HE CHARGES TOWARDS WINTERFELL WUN WUN IN THE LEAD

NOW THROUGH ALL THIS WUN WUN HAS HAD A MASSIVE SHIELD ON HIS BACK MADE FROM SPLIT SAPLINGS AND COVERED IN LEATHER OR RAWHIDE HE UNSLINGS IT NOW AS HE CHARGES WINTERFELL IT STOPS THE FIRST SPRINGALD BOLT WHICH PENETRATES A FOOT THE SECOND NEARLY PENETRATES ALL THE WAY THROUGH AND THE THIRD ACTUALLY MANAGES TO INJURE WUN WUN THE BOLTON ARCHERS ARE SHOOTING AT HIM NOW THE FOURTH AND FINAL BOLT PINS WUN SHIELD TO HIS BODY BUT IN ONE LAST EFFORT HE SHOULDER CHARGES THE GATE WHICH BREAKS OPEN AND STUMBLES INTO THE COURTYARD BEYOND STILL BEING SHOT AT BY ARCHERS

THINGS THEN PROCEED MUCH THE SAME AS THEY DID IN THE SHOW ONLY WITH A SMALL BUT REASONABLE SIZED GROUP OF ARCHERS AND MEN AT ARMS FOLLOWING JON INTO WINTERFELL FOLLOWED BY A LARGE GROUP OF KOTA LEAD BY ANSA AND LITTLEFINGER

BOTH RAMSAY AND JON ARE THUS COMPETENT GENERALS BOTH MAKE MISTAKES TRUE TO THEIR CHARACTER AND A MINIMAL SUSPENSION OF DISBELIEF IS REQUIRED
JON SHOULD HAVE SENT ARCHERS THROUGH THE SECRET WINTERFELL TUNNEL MAISTER LEWIN TOLD THEON ABOUT THE ARCHERS COULD MOUNT BATTLEMENTS AND SHOOT FORCES FROM BEHIND
STEP GIVE A BOW AND HAVE HIM SHOOT FROM OUTSIDE OF THE RANGE OF THE DEFENDING ARCHERS

LANDING SEASON STORY REVEALED THE NATURE OF KL FROM THE GET GO SHOWED ALL THE SCHEMING BY DIFFERENT CHARACTERS CONTROVERSY AND SCANDALS THAT ARE REVEALED AND WATCHING THE TRUTH UNRAVEL IN FRONT OF EYES SET THE PACE FOR THE ENTIRE SERIES THERE WERE A FEW CONVERSATIONS BETWEEN LITTLEFINGER AND MARYS THAT SHOW INCREDIBLE DIALOGUE AND OVERALL HAD THE CLEAREST NARRATIVE OF THEM ALL IN MY OPINION

ACROSS THE SEA SEASON DOES IT FOR ME MOSTLY THE TRION BORAH STORY PLOT WAS SORT OF BORING TO BE HONEST UNTIL THE END BUT STORY WAS THE STRONGEST NARRATIVE OF THE ENTIRE SEASON BEGINNING AS AN EXILE WHO JUST MURDERED HIS FATHER IT SEEMS LIKE ALL HOPE IS LOST FOR TRION AFTER GAINING A SENSE OF PURPOSE THANKS TO MARYS HE ENDS AS ACTING RULER OF MERMEN RISE WAS AN INCREDIBLY CLEAR AND SENSIBLE NARRATIVE AND HIS DIALOGUE ALONG THE WAY WITH MARYS BORAH THE MASTERS AND EVENTUALLY ANY EXEMPLIFIED HIS CLEVERNESS

ROBB MARCHES SOUTH TAKING ALL OF THE FIGHTING MEN WITH HIM MANY OF THOSE MEN WILL NEVER RETURN HOME TO SEE THEIR FAMILIES PLANT CROPS ETC BECAUSE OF DECISION TO BREAK HIS OATH TO WALDER FREY AND MARRY A FOREIGN WHORE

WHILE ROBB IS IN THE SOUTH WITH THE ARMY THE NORTH IS RAIDED AND OCCUPIED BY THE IRONBORN LONG STANDING CASTLES FALL TO THEIR REAVERS AND THEY KILL AND RAPE AND PILLAGE ALL THE WAY ACROSS THE LAND WHILE THAT IS GOING ON THEIR KING DOES NOTHING

THE RED WEDDING HAPPENS MOST OF THAT ARMY IS SLAUGHTERED BECAUSE OF OATH BREAKING HOUSE BOLTON NOW RULES THE NORTH HAVING A LARGE AND MASSIVE ARMY AT ITS BACK THOSE THAT STAND UP TO ROOSE AND HIS BASTARD LOOK AT LORD BERWYN ARE SKINNED ALIVE AND DISPLAYED FOR ALL TO SEE

THEY RETAKE THE CASTLES LOST TO THE IRONBORN AND GIVE THEM BACK WITH THE IMPLICIT WARNING OF WE HELPED YOU WE CAN TAKE IT AWAY

WHAT'S MORE IS THAT YOU HEAR THAT NED BASTARD IS LETTING WILDLINGS BY THE THOUSANDS INTO THE NORTH THE WILDLINGS WHO HAVE RAIDED RAPED AND PILLAGED FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS WHEN THEY WERE ABLE TO GET BEYOND THE WALL

A HOW MUCH OF A HEAD START DID TRION GET
B HOW MUCH DOES CERASEIN USUALLY DRINK
C HOW MUCH DOES TRION USUALLY DRINK
D FOR WHAT LENGTH OF TIME WILL EACH ALCOHOLIC LEAD FOR WHAT LENGTH OF TIME WILL THEY TIE
E EXPLAIN THE SIGNIFICANCE OF BEING VICTORIOUS IN THIS CONTEST OF DRINKING AND INSULTS

A
B S
C S
D TRION WINS FOR T D CERASEIN WINS FOR T D
E THE ANSWER TO A IS CONSTANT COEFFICIENT MINUS CONSTANT COEFFICIENT WHICH IS ZERO THE ANSWER TO B IS THE SLOPE LINEAR COEFFICIENT OF EQUATION THE ANSWER TO C IS THE SLOPE OF EQUATION THE ANSWER TO D IS THE INTERSECTION OF THE TWO EQUATIONS

IN A FEUDAL SOCIETY NOBLE FAMILIES OFTEN SENT SONS TO FOSTER WITH ALLIES FRIENDS OR FAMILIES TO WHICH THEY OWED FEALTY THE PURPOSE WAS TO REMOVE THE CHILD FROM A FAMILY ENVIRONMENT WHERE LOVE OR CONCERN COULD NEGATIVELY EFFECT HIS TRAINING AND UPBRINGING THE CHILD STARTED AS A PAGE TO THE FOSTER MOTHER LEARNING MANNERS AND SOCIAL AND CULTURAL SKILLS AND THEN AS A SQUIRE TO THE FOSTER FATHER WHO TAUGHT HIM LEADERSHIP MANAGEMENT AND WEAPONS SKILLS
A WARD WAS AN ORPHAN FROM A NOBLE FAMILY THE FAMILY TO WHICH THE FAMILY OWED FEALTY OR A HIGHER LORD LIKE A DUKE OR EVEN THE KING WOULD TAKE CHARGE OF THEIR SECURITY AND RAISE THEM WHILE THEY WERE MINORS DURING WHICH TIME ANY LANDS OR WEALTH OF THE FAMILY WOULD BE MANAGED AND ANY INCOME GENERATED ENJOYED BY THE PROTECTORS ONCE THE WARD REACHED THEIR MAJORITY THEY WOULD INHERIT FULL CONTROL OF THEIR FAMILY'S WEALTH AND LANDS ONE IMPORTANT POWER HELD OVER A FEMALE WARD WAS THE AUTHORITY TO NEGOTIATE A MARRIAGE WHICH WOULD BE DONE TO SECURE THE LOYALTY OF ANOTHER FAMILY OWING FEALTY TO THE LORD OR TO MAKE AN ALLIANCE

ALSO A SOCIETY CAN ATROPHY AND REACH A STATE OF EQUILIBRIUM THAT MAINTAINS ACCEPTED CUSTOMS AND TRADITIONS EGYPTIAN SOCIETY REMAINED ESSENTIALLY UNCHANGED FOR YEARS AND THAT OF CHINA FOR AS MUCH AS ANCIENT EGYPTIAN SOCIETY EVENTUALLY COLLAPSED AND DISAPPEARED AFTER MULTIPLE INVASIONS AND OCCUPATIONS SOCIETY ONLY BEGAN TO CHANGE FROM THE EXTERNAL STIMULI OF MULTIPLE DEFEATS BY EUROPEAN INCURSIONS

GAME OF THRONES SEASON IN MINUTES

ROBERT BARATHRON RULES THE REALM OF ESTEROS

HE DEPOSED THE DRAGON DYNASTY AND MARRIED A BANNISTER CERASEIN

WHO BREEDS A BROOD OF BASTARDS WITH HER BROTHER JAIME

WHO BREAKS BACK TO KEEP THE SECRET

LADY CAT CAPTURES TRION FALSELY ACCUSES HIM

ALYSA TRIES TO MAKE HIM FLY BUT BLADE EXCUSES HIM

NED STARTS TO SEE THAT THE SEED IS STRONG SO HE TRIES TO TELL BOBBY

BUT HE'S GORED BY A BOAR CAUSE OF CERASEIN SO NED TRIES TO SET SHIT STRAIGHT BUT BAALISH

BETRAYS HIM AND NED GETS BEHEADED ON THE STEPS OF SEPTEMBER

YOUNG ROBB GATHERS THE BANNERS BATTLES SOUTH AND IS CROWNED

ARYA TRAINS THEN RUNS AWAY ANSA SUFFERS BOFF AND THE HOUND

WHILE JON JOINS THE WATCH ON THE WALL WHERE WINTER IS FALLING AND WILDLINGS ARE CALLING

AND WALKERS ARE STALKING AND DEAD MEN ARE WALKING

AND ANY WEDS DRAGO HER BROTHER GOES LOCO CROWNED WITH GOLD OH AND DRAGO DIES TOO

ANY RAISES A PYRE AND STRIDES INTO FIRE AND RISES AS THE MOTHER OF DRAGONS

DRAMATIC PAUSE

ROBB BATTLES BANNISTERS FALLS IN LOVE WITH ALISA

WHICH BREAKS HIS OATH TO WALDER FREY AND HE AIN'T BLOODY HAVING THAT

THEON TAKES A BOAT TO BALON TURNS HIS CLOAK TO MAKE HIM GREYJOY

TAKES WINTERFELL LOSES IT AND RAMSAY SNOW ABUSES HIM

BRAN AND RECKON GET AWAY BRAN GOES WITH JOHEN THERE'S A CROW

WHILE STANNIC CLAIMS THE IRON THRONE THOUGH HIS DENIED BY HIS BRO

SO SHANKED BY A SHADOW FIRED FROM THE VAGINA OF A PRIESTESS OF FIRE

STANNIC THEN SAILS FOR BLACKWATER BAY BUT HE'S SET AFLAME AND LOSES THE DAY

TRION LOSES FACE BUT HE'S STILL LOVED BY SHAE AT THE END OF THE DAY SO IT'S OKAY

ARYA WALKS WITH GOREN BUT SHE'S CAUGHT AND HAULED TO HARRENHAL

IT'S AWFUL BUT SHE'S SUPPORTED BY AN ASSASSIN CALLED AGEN

ANY WALKS THE WASTE AND TALKS THIRTEEN QARTHEEN TO LET HET IN TO THEIR CITY

GOES TO A PARTY ASKS FOR AN ARMY ARO AND KYAT PREE STEAL HER DRAGONS

SO SHE GOES TO THE HOME OF UNDYING GETS HIGH AND KILLS A GUY WITH FIRE

WHILE THE WATCHMEN WALK BEYOND THE WALL AND THORIN FORCES JON TO TURN HIS CLOAK TO THE FREE FOLK

SO WHILE THE WATCH IS FIGHTING WIGHTS AND THINGS SPOONING GINGER WILDLINGS ALSO THERE'S AN ARMY OF THE DEAD

DRAMATIC PAUSE

CAT SENDS JAIME WITH BIENNE TO THE SOUTH THEN LOCKE CAPTURES THEM AND LOPS OFF HAND OUCH

THE FLEYS GET FED UP SO ROBB GETS RED WEDDED KILLING CAT AND ALISA WHILE GETTING BEDDED

ARYA IS CAPTURED BY BROS WITH NO BANNERS THE HOUND FIGHTS A FIRE KNIGHT WHO RISES AFTER BATTLE

ARYA TAKES FLIGHT BUT IS CAUGHT BY SANDOR WHO HAULS HER ROUND THE RIVER LANDS HOPING FOR A RANSOM

JON MEETS MANCE THE WILDLING KING FIGHTING FOR FREE FOLK

THEY CLIMB THE WALL JON KILLS A ARG THEN GOES BACK TO THE WATCH

ANY GETS UNSULLIED ELMY DARIO GLISSANDI AND LIBERATES THE SLAVE CITIES OF ASTAPOR AND YUNGKIA

JOFFREY DIES FROM TYRELL WINE ANOTHER WEDDING NOTHER DEAD KING

CERASEIN BLAMES HER BROTHER TRION IN HIS TRIAL THE VIPER FIGHTS FOR HIM

OBERON DIES AND SO DOES GREG THOUGH LYBURN MAKES CLEANSE UNDEAD

JAIME SAVES TRION WHO SLAYS SHAE AND TWIN THE SPIDER MARYS SENDS THE DWARF ACROSS TO CENTOS

ANSA LEAVES THE CITY WITH PETAR LITTLEFINGER WHO LIES WIFES ALYSA THEN MAKES HER FLY THE EYRIE

ARYA WANDERS ROUND WITH SANDOR KILLS SOME PEOPLE WHO HAD WRONGED HER

HOUND GETS BUT BY A BLOKE CALLED BITER FALLS TO BIENNE WHEN HE FIGHTS HER

ARYA DENIES SANDOR MERCY SHOWS SOME IRON TO TAKE A BOAT EAST

THE WATCH FIGHTS WILDLINGS AND KARL BOOKING TANNER

JON GOES OUT BEYOND THE WALL AND IS SAVED BY KING STANNIC

ANY T CAPTURES MERMEN LOCKS UP HER DRAGONS TO MAKE PEACE

ANSA MARRIES RAMSAY THE NORTH REMEMBERS THEN FORGETS

SHE JUMPS THE WALLS OF WINTERFELL WHEN SHE'S NOT SAVED BY BIENNE

MEL TELLS STANNIC BURN YOUR DAUGHTER AND IT'S DONE

THEN STANNIC AND HIS ARMY'S SLAUGHTERED BY RAMSAY BOLTON

CERASEIN TRIES TO FRAME THE TRELLAS ENDS UP WALKING WITH A SHAME BELL

NOW SHE'S GONNA BLOODY PAY HELL ON THE HIGH AND MIGHTY SPARROW

JAIME COMES TO ADORNE WITH BARONNE TO SAVE HIS DAUGHTER AND HE

GETS CAUGHT UP WITH OBARA NYU SYENE TALKS BOUT BAD PUSSY

ARYA ARRIVES AT BRAVOS JOINS THE HOUSE OF BLACK AND WHITE

SHE LEARNS TO LIE LOSES HER SIGHT SO THAT SHE MIGHT BECOME NO ONE

JON SNOW WINS A VOTE GOES TO HARDHOME GETS SOME FREE FOLK ON A BOAT THEN HE GETS STABBED

ANY FIGHTS INSURGENCY FORM THE SONS OF THE HARPY

TRIES A PIT FIGHT AND A MARRIAGE BUT THEY BOTH GO PRETTY BADLY SO SHE FLIES AWAY ON A DRAGON

ANSA ESCAPES FROM WINTERFELL AND MAKES HER WAY NORTH TO THE WALL WHERE THE RED WITCH IS RAZZING JON WHO KILLS HIS KILLERS WATCH IS DONE

RAMSAY BOLTON EXPANDS HIS HOLD ON THE LORDS OF THE NORTHERN KINGDOM

SO JON MARCHES ARMIES BASTARDBOWL IS ON THE GOOD GUYS WON

ARYA TRAINS PLAYS SAVES LADY CRANE SLAYS THE RAF DISPLAYS HER FACE ESCAPES THE FACELESS BRAKES EVISCERATES A FREY AND SAAD SHE'S ARYA STARK

THE TRAINING BRAN TO SEE THROUGH TREES MAGIC ABILITIES

ZOMBIES ALMOST KILL THEM ALL BUT HODER HOLDS THE DOOR

BEN SAVES BRAN AND BEERA THEN SAYS SEEMA BRAN SEES A SECRET DYANNA IS MOM

WHILE THE HOUND ROAMS ROUND THE RIVERBANKS JOINS THE BROTHERS MERRY BAND

JAIME AND BRONN BREAK RIVERRUN BLACKFISH WOULD RATHER DIE THAN RUN

SAM AND GILLY GO TO HORN HILL MEET ASSHOLE FATHER RANDALL

THEY GO TO OLDTOWN TAKING HEARTSBANE TO LEARN SOME STUFF FROM THE MASTERS

CERASEIN BURNS THE SPARROWS TRELLAS ALL HER ENEMIES AND THEN BECAUSE HER SON IS DEAD DECLARES HERSELF THE QUEEN

SLAUGHTERED BY SAND SNAKES SO GLENNA FORGES CAUSE WITH ADORNE AND ANY AGAINST ORDER SETTING STAGE FOR MASSIVE WAR

THEN ANY GOES BACK TO AES DOTHRAK BARBEQUES HER PERSECUTORS TAKES A KHALASAR AND MARCHES TO MERMEN

SHE BREAKS THE SEIGE WITH FIRE MAKES FAST FRIENDS OF THEON AARA AND FINALLY AFTER ALL THESE YEARS HEADS WEST TO ESTEROS
THIS IS KINDA COOL I GUESS BUT IT'S NOT REALLY WHAT I FOLLOW ALT SHIFT FOR

TOLMEN FOR SURE AND THE TRELLAS IN THE FINALE BEFORE THAT IT WAS NED
MARCELLA THAT WAS THE FIRST ONE I LEGITIMATELY HAD NO IDEA WAS COMING OTHERS I KNEW FROM THE BOOKS OR SPOTTED SUBTLE HINTS LEADING UP TO IT BUT I HAD NO IDEA MARCELLA WAS GOING TO GO
HODER AS A BOOK READER I KNEW MOST OF THE DEATHS THAT WERE COMING BUT HODER LAST SEASON WAS SUCH A SHOCK I BURST OUT CRYING SECOND MOST SHOCKING WAS BARRISTAN AS HE'S STILL ALIVE IN THE BOOKS
AFTER I REALIZED HOW GOT WORKED I WOULD SAY SER BARRISTAN
THE RED WEDDING

IT STILL MAKES MY BLOOD BOIL ANY TIME I RECATCH THAT EPISODE
I KNOW IT'S OBVIOUS BUT ROBB AND CATHERYN STARKS DEATHS SHOCKED ME THE MOST I JUST FINISHED THE SHOW AND THE RED WEDDING CRUSHED ME
ROOSE

HONESTLY I THOUGHT HE WAS GOING TO KILL RAMSEY I REALLY DIDN'T SEE IT GOING THE COMPLETE OPPOSITE WAY
NED BY FAR NO SINGLE DEATH WAS NEARLY AS SURPRISING SHOCKING YES THE RED WEDDING WAS AWFUL CRUEL DIABOLICAL AND SUPER TERRIBLE TO WITNESS ON FILM BUT EVEN IF YOU DIDN'T KNOW THE OUTCOME THE WHOLE EPISODE REALLY DID GIVE YOU AN EERIE SOMETHING ISN'T RIGHT ABOUT THIS KIND OF FEELING NED CONFESSED HIS CRIMES AND CERASEIN THE MAIN ANTAGONIST IN SEASON HAD CLEARLY AGREED TO THE TERMS OF THEIR ARRANGEMENT AFTER HE MADE HIS I'M A CRIMINAL SPEECH IT SEEMED LIKE HE'D BE OFF TO THE WALL WHILE A WAR WOULD ERUPT AROUND HIS ABSENCE

BUT NOBODY NOT EVEN THE CHARACTERS IN THE SHOW EXPECTED JOFFREY TO GO FROM A LITTLE WHINY CUNT TO FULL BLOWN PSYCHOPATH ALL THE PIECES WERE THERE BUT IT JUST SEEMED LIKE NED HAD WRAPPED UP HIS FAILURES IN KL WITH A SENTENCE TO TAKE THE BLACK ANNNND HE'S DECAPITATED
I MEAN I EXPECTED HIS DEATH BUT NOT LIKE THAT AND NOT SO SOON
LADY IT MADE ME REALISE THAT EVEN THE LITTLE WOLVES WERE ON STAKE
TOLMEN LEAPING FROM HIS WINDOW REALLY GOT ME ESPECIALLY ALL THE KINGS LANDING JOKES AFTERWARDS
GRIOTTE
HE WAS MY FAVORITE CHARACTER AT THE TIME
DEFINITELY JON I STARTED WATCHING AT ABOUT SEASON SO I ALREADY KNEW ABOUT NED OTHERWISE THAT WOULD HAVE BEEN ALSO MY FIRST TIME WATCHING I DIDN'T CONNECT TO ROBB AND CAT AS MUCH SO WHEN THEY DIED IT WASN'T ALL THAT CRAZY TO ME BUT JON WAS SO IMPORTANT WHEN THEY KILLED HIM I THOUGHT WELL WHAT ON EARTH WILL THE SHOW BE ABOUT NOW
ROB AND CATHERYN AFTER NED DIED I ASSUMED ROB STARK WAS GOING TO BE THE PIVOTAL PROTAGONIST REPRESENTING THE NORTH FOR THE POLITICAL PART OF THE STORY WAR BETWEEN THE HOUSES WITH JON LEADING THE MYSTICAL PART OF THE STORY WHITE WALKERS ETC AND THEN EVENTUALLY THE TWO STORY LINES WOULD UNITE FOR THE FINAL SHOWDOWN AGAINST THE WHITE WALKERS HAVING ENTIRE STORY ARC EFFECTIVELY WIPED OUT IN ONE EPISODE TOOK ME TOTALLY BY SURPRISE
ROZ I DIDN'T REALIZE THAT LF HAD FIGURED OUT THAT SHE WAS WORKING FOR MARYS UNTIL SHE WAS ALREADY DEAD
STANNIC I'D SAY HIS WHOLE STORYLINE JUST CAME TO A SUDDEN TWISTED END BEFORE HE LOST THE BATTLE HE LOST HIS FAMILY THE LOOK OF FATIGUE IN HIS EYES NEAR THE END IS WHAT GOT ME LIKE HE WAS THINKING OKAY I'LL EITHER DIE OR I'LL WIN THIS BATTLE EITHER WAY IT WILL END PRAISE RED RAHLOO SO YEAH THE WAY HE JUST KIND OF GAVE UP WHEN HE TOLD BIENNE TO DO HER DUTY IT JUST SEEMED SO OUT OF CHARACTER AND IT MADE YOU REALIZE WHAT THE WAR DID TO HIM
ALSO THE BLACKFISH SHOW WTF WAS THAT
HAS TO GO TO THE SATANICAL IN THE BOOKS HE WILL ALMOST CERTAINLY WIN AND HE IS ONE OF THE GREATEST STRATEGISTS IN THE SERIES I WAS EXPECTING A SURPRISE VICTORY INSTEAD WE GOT BIENNE DOING HER DUTY BY FORGETTING HER DUTY AND KINGSLAYING WHILE RAMSAY IS OVERPOWERED FOR ABOUT A SEASON AFTER NOT COOL IN THE BIBLE DANIEL DISAPPOINTED DAVID
RECKON WAS PROBABLY THE MOST SHOCKING FOR ME I DEFINITELY EXPECTED HIM TO DIE AT THE HANDS OF RAMSAY BOLTON BUT WHEN THE THIRD ARROW MISSED HIM I HAD A GLIMMER OF HOPE THAT JON WOULD ACTUALLY REACH HIM IN TIME EVERYONE KNOWS IT'S LIKE TV AND MOVIE LAND WHEN THE FIRST TWO SHOTS MISS THE THIRD ALWAYS HITS SO WHEN THE FOURTH ARROW PIERCED HEART I WAS PRETTY SHOCKED

BUT THANKFULLY WE DIDN'T HAVE LONG TO DWELL ON HIS DEATH BECAUSE OF THE ANXIETY INDUCING BATTLE SCENE THAT IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWED
DORAN MARTELL I WAS EXTREMELY SURPRISED BUT NOT IN A GOOD WAY MY RESPONSE HOW THE HELL DOES THAT MAKE ANY SENSE TO ANYONE
NED THEN HODER
NOTHING COMPARES TO THE RED WEDDING IT WAS ONE OF THE MOST JAW DROPPING TV MOMENTS FOR ME
MARGERY FOR SURE I THOUGHT SHE WOULD MAKE IT OUT IN TIME
REPLIES SO FAR AND NO ONE MENTIONED BARRISTAN

HE DESERVED TO BE ALIVE EVEN UNTIL THE FINALE
TOLMEN AFTER EVERYTHING THAT HAPPENED IN THAT FIRST MINUTES I THOUGHT THEY WERE JUST HOLDING ON THAT SHOT FOR A BIT OF A BREATH BREAK NOPE SURE THE FUCK WERENT

IN THE EPISODE WE SEE ARYA AND THE WAIF BATTLING WITH STICKS AND ARYA KNOCKED DOWN THE WAIF THEN SAYS YOU WILL NEVER BE ONE OF US IN TO WHICH JAEN APPEARS AND SAYS A GIRL HAS A POINT NEXT SCENE SHOWS ARYA WALKING WITH JAEN AND HE GOES ON TO TELL THE HISTORY OF THE FACELESS MEN SAYING NONE WERE EVER BORN FROM LORDS OR LADIES AND THAT THEY WERE OFFERED A GIFT A FACE HE THEN PROCEEDS TO GIVE ARYA HER TASK IN KILLING LADY CRANE AND SAYS EITHER WAY A FACE WILL BE ADDED TO THE HALL

WHEN ARYA ASKS JAEN WHY LADY CRANE AND THAT SHE SEEMS NICE JAEN RESPONDS WITH DOES DEATH ONLY COME FOR THE WICKED ARYA SAYS NO AND THE SCENE ENDS

WHY WOULD ROBB HAVE USED IT

HE HAD PROBABLY NEVER TRAINED WITH IT AS NORTHERNERS DON'T TEND TO USE PLATE ARMOUR DUE TO THE COLD WEATHER MEANING THAT IT WOULD HAVE BEEN EVEN MORE CUMBERSOME

NOT TO MENTION HOW WE SEE MOST NORTHERNERS FIGHT THEY ARE SMALL AND NIMBLE WHEREAS SOUTHERN KNIGHTS HACK AND SLASH AND NEED THE EXTRA PROTECTION IT'S PART OF WHY ARYA TAKES SO WELL TO WATER DANCING

PLUS PLATE ARMOUR SEEMS TO ONLY BE A THING IN THE TRUE SOUTHERN KINGDOMS

WE SEE BORAH WITH PLATE ARMOUR BUT HE IS ALSO A TOURNEY KNIGHT WE SEE KNIGHTS OF THE VALE WITH BREASTPLATES BUT THEN AGAIN THEY ARE ALL TRULY ANDAL

THE RIVERLANDS USE SCALE ARMOUR AND THE NORTHERNERS USE LEATHER AND CHAINMAIL BECAUSE THOSE ARE THE MOST EFFICIENT

THEY AREN'T AS HEAVY THEY AREN'T AS CUMBERSOME THEY ARE EASY TO REPAIR AND IT ALLOWS FOR EASIER THEMATIC DISTINCTION
COLD WEATHER HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH IT YOU WEAR A GAMBESON UNDER THE PLATE TO PROTECT THE SKIN FROM THE MOVEMENT OF THE PLATE THE PROBLEM WITH PLATE OR EVEN MAIL OR ANY METAL OR HORN ARMOR WORN OVER THE ENTIRE BODY IS THAT IT REQUIRES A PADDED GARMENT UNDERNEATH THIS ALLOWS NO HEAT OR SWEAT FROM THE BODY TO ESCAPE AND A MAJOR THREAT TO KNIGHTS IN FULL PLATE OR MAIL IN A HOT SUMMER WAS HEAT STROKE IN COLD WEATHER FUR COULD BE ADDED TO THE GAMBESON OR A SURCOAT WORN OVER THE PLATE TO ADD WARMTH

BTW MANY OF THE NORTHERNERS WEAR PIECES OF PLATE LIKE GORGETS AND PAULDRONS AND SUCH

BTW LEATHER IS NOT ARMOR UNLESS SEWED IN LEVELS THAT ARE UNMANAGEABLE LEATHER CANNOT PROTECT AGAINST ANY WEAPONS OTHER THAN THOSE THAT SLICE AND DICE LEATHER WHEN BOILED IN WAX TO THE CONSISTENCY OF RAWHIDE CAN BE USED AS ARMOR BUT WAS MOSTLY USED AS A SUPPLEMENT SINCE IT WAS EASIER TO ENGRAVE BOILED LEATHER BOILED LEATHER HELMETS AND ARMOR PIECES WERE USED THROUGHOUT HISTORY BUT NEVER IN PREFERENCE TO METAL

THE ISSUE IS COST THE NORTH RESEMBLES IN SOME WAYS THE LOWLANDS OF SCOTLAND OR THE BORDER LANDS IN NORTHERN ENGLAND THE SCOTS COULD NEVER PRODUCE ENOUGH BATTLE CAVALRY TO RIVAL THE ENGLISH KNIGHTS AND MEN-AT-ARMS WHICH LED TO A NUMBER OF DEFEATS WHEN THE ENGLISH COMBINED MOUNTED CHARGES WITH ARROW STORMS FROM LONGBOWS PLATE WAS EXPENSIVE THOUGH THE MOST EXPENSIVE PART OF A EQUIPMENT WAS HIS WAR HORSE MAIL WASN'T MUCH CHEAPER BECAUSE OF THE MANUAL LABOR REQUIRED TO MAKE THE RINGS LINK THEM AND BUTT AND RIVET THE CONNECTING LINKS PLATE PIECES SUCH AS PAULDRONS BEVORS HELMETS CUIRASSES GREAVES WERE WORN SEPARATELY BY BOTH MOUNTED AND DISMOUNTED WARRIORS PLATES COULD WIRED OR RIVETED INTO A JACKET MADE OF HEAVY CLOTH OR LEATHER INTO A BRIGANDINE OR A JACK OF PLATES SUCH AS NED AND JON WEAR IN THE SHOW MAIL COIFS BISHOP'S MANTLES SHORT SHIRTS HAUBERKS AND CHAPS COULD ALSO BE WORN SEPARATELY SCALE AND LAMELLAR ARMOR WAS CHEAPER AS IT CONSISTED OF SMALL PLATES OF METAL OR HORN ATTACHED TO A BACKGROUND THE SCALE WAS ATTACHED WITH EACH SCALE LAID OVER THE ROW BELOW SO THAT DOWNWARD BLOWS ENCOUNTER TWO LEVELS OF SCALES BUT UPWARD STABS COULD PENETRATE THROUGH THE BACK GARMENT WHICH WAS NOT GOOD FOR A MOUNTED WARRIOR LAMELLAR WAS SMALL PLATES LACED TOGETHER WITH EACH PLATE COVERING THE LOWER PART OF ROW ABOVE IT THRUSTING UPWARD AND BLOWS AGAINST THE ARMOR MET RESISTANCE FROM MULTIPLE PLATES BUT DOWNWARD STABS COULD SLIP BETWEEN THE PLATES THIS IS WHY FEUDAL SOCIETY DEVELOPED NOT EVERY MILITARY AGE MALE COULD BE FULLY EQUIPPED ONCE THE ADMINISTRATIVE RESOURCES OF THE EMPIRE DISAPPEARED SO PEOPLE BANDED TOGETHER TO ARM EQUIP AND MOUNT ONE AMONGST THEM SINCE THESE WERE THE BEST ARMED THEY SOON GRABBED POWER AND BECAME A HEREDITARY NOBILITY

EVEN CHEAPER WERE AKETON OR JACKS WHICH WERE JACKETS OR COATS OF TWO LAYERS OF HEAVY CLOTH SEWN TOGETHER WITH RAW COTTON RAGS EVEN STRAW BETWEEN THE LAYERS SUCH A COAT COULD WITHSTAND ARROWS FROM LONG RANGE BLOWS BY MACES AND CLUBS BUT WASN'T REALLY MUCH PROTECTION AGAINST LANCES SPEARS AND SWORDS BUT IT WAS BETTER THAN NOTHING

NO NORTHERNERS ARE NOT SMALL AND NIMBLE CERTAINLY NED JON AND ROBB WERE EQUAL IN SIZE TO MOST SOUTHERNERS AND NO ONE COULD CALL LORD MANNERLY SMALL AND NIMBLE

AS I SAID THE NORTH WAS MUCH LIKE LOWLAND SCOTLAND AND NORTHERN ENGLAND WITH A PROUD BUT POOR NOBILITY AND GENTRY AND A LARGE NUMBER OF COMMON FREEMEN FREE PEASANTS AND YEOMEN WHO COULD PARTLY ARMOR THEMSELVES AND FIGHT IN SHIELD WALLS OR SPEAR HEDGES AND STAND OFF ANY CHARGE BY KNIGHTS AS LONG AS THEIR MORALE HELD AND THEY DIDN'T FACE MISSILE WEAPONS THE SWISS SOLVED THAT PROBLEM WITH THEIR PIKE SCHILTRONS BY ADDING CROSSBOWMEN AND HANGUNNERS ON THE FLANKS THE NORTH HAS ARCHERS AND CROSSBOWS ARE AVAILABLE SO USING ENGLISH DISMOUNTED TACTICS OF BLOCKS OF LONGBOWS OR CROSSBOWS BEHIND PALVAISES OR FIELD FORTIFICATIONS LIKE POINTED STAKES ALTERNATING WITH BLOCKS OF INFANTRY ARMED WITH PIKES SPEARS POLE ARMS LIKE BILLS HALBERDS POLE AXES AND SHIELDS WOULD BE SIMPLE WHERE THE NORTH DIFFERS IS THAT IT'S HALF THE SIZE OF SOUTH AMERICA SO THAT EVEN WITH AN EQUIVALENT POPULATION DENSITY TO LOWLAND SCOTLAND IN CE THERE WOULD BE ALMOST A MILLION ADULT MALES OF MILITARY AGE IF THE MILITARY COMPOSITION HELD TRUE IN PROPORTION THERE WOULD BE ABOUT KNIGHTS OF THE NOBILITY WITH WAR HORSES AND FULL ARMOR ANOTHER SQUIRES AS MEDIUM CAVALRY WITH CHARGERS AND ARMOR HEAVY AND MEDIUM CAVALRY FROM THE GENTRY AND LIGHT CAVALRY LIKE BORDER REIVERS WITH BORDER PONIES QUARTERHORSES AND LANCES JAVELINS DARTS HELMETS AND SOME ADDITIONAL ARMOR AND SHIELDS THERE WOULD BE HEAVY ARMORED FOOT WITH ARMOR WITH PIKES AND SUCH ANOTHER MEDIUM FOOT TO HALF ARMOR WITH LONGBOWS OR CROSSBOWS LIGHT MEDIUM FOOT WITH LONGBOWS OR CROSSBOWS AND LIGHT MEDIUM FOOT WITH PIKES SPEARS AND SUCH THE LIGHT FOOT WOULD HAVE JACKS HELMETS SHIELDS AND NOT MUCH ELSE

WHILE YOU COULD MOBILIZE ALL THESE MEN THE LOGISTICS AREN'T THERE TO SUSTAIN THEM IN A FEUDAL SOCIETY AS LARGE AS THE NORTH TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE WOULD BE MINIMAL AND PRIMITIVE SO LIKE ANGLO-SAXON ENGLAND THE KING WOULD GO TO THE POINT OF DANGER WITH HIS HOUSEHOLD TROOPS LIKE THE HUSCARL AND MOBILIZE THE LOCAL LEVY OR FYRD SO IF THE WALL WAS THREATENED JON COULD PROBABLY RAISE OF THE FORCES ABOVE WITHIN THREE WEEKS THE SAME IF HE HAD TO DEFEND THE NECK OR AGAINST A MAJOR IRONBORN INCURSION ANY EXPEDITIONARY FORCE OUTSIDE THE NORTH WOULD NOT BE MUCH LARGE THAN TO OF THE ABOVE FORCES AND THEN WOULD BE AVAILABLE ONLY FOR DAYS

AS A COMPARISON THE BANNISTERS WERE A RICH HOUSE AT LEAST THROUGH SEASON 2 AS ARE THE TRELLAS THEY CAN AFFORD WELL EQUIPPED STANDING ARMIES OF PROFESSIONALS THEIR LEVIES ON THE OTHER HAND WOULD BE ONLY SLIGHTLY BETTER EQUIPPED AND ARMED THAN THE THE FLEYS ARE AS POOR AS THE NORTH BUT THE TALLYS HOLDING THE RIVER LANDS WHILE NOT RICH ENOUGH TO MAINTAIN STANDING ARMIES HAD NOBILITY AND FREEMEN RICH ENOUGH TO AFFORD BETTER EQUIPMENT AND ARMS LIKE THE KNIGHTS OF THE VALE THE STORM LANDS WERE AS POOR AS THE NORTH WHILE DORN IN THE HOT SOUTH WOULD HAVE ARMS AND ARMOR MORE LIKE THAT OF IBERIA LESS PLATE MORE MAIL LESS ARMOR MORE MISSILE WEAPONS LIKE JAVELINS AND DARTS AS FAR AS THE IRONBORN THEY ARE A SMALL POPULATION BASE THEIR ECONOMICS ARE BASED ON RAIDING AND TRADING SO THEY WOULD BE EQUIPPED BASED ON WEALTH AND WITH WHATEVER THEY COULD BUY OR PILLAGE
I'M SURE ROBB HAD STEEL PLATE ON WHEN THEY CAPTURED JAMIE
IT'S NOT JUST LEATHER IT'S A COAT OF PLATES
THE NORTH IS NOT WEALTHY EITHER BANNISTER SOLDIERS CAN HAVE GOLD AND ORNATE DECORATION BUT THAT'S NOT SOMETHING STARKS COULD AFFORD TO GIVE ALL THEIR MEN
BECAUSE THE SHOWRUNNERS AND THE DESIGN TEAM HAVE LITTLE BACKGROUND IN MEDIEVAL MILITARY HISTORY AND AS A RESULT HAVEN'T DEVELOPED MANY BELIEVABLE ARMOUR DESIGNS PEOPLE CAN DOWNVOTE ALL THEY LIKE BUT THIS IS THE TRUTH THEY DESIGNED ARMOUR THAT LOOKS GOOD TO THOSE WITHOUT MUCH KNOWLEDGE ON THE SUBJECT AND SUITS THE OVERALL AESTHETIC THAT THE PRODUCERS ARE AIMING FOR

IN THIS CASE I SUSPECT THE GOAL WAS TO SHOW THE NORTHERNERS AS A SIMPLE NO NONSENSE PEOPLE WHOSE ARMOUR WAS MORE DISTINCTIVE THAN THE MORE COMMON AND MORE AUTHENTIC MAIL THE LARGE GAPS BETWEEN THE PLATES AND WHAT I SUSPECT IS THE USE OF SOLING LEATHER INSTEAD OF STEEL SIMPLIFIES PRODUCTION REDUCES COSTS AND AVOIDS THE NEED FOR SPECIALISED CRAFTSMEN TO BUILD AND MAINTAIN THE COSTUME

USE OF BASIC ARMOUR ONLY MILDLY AUGMENTED WITH OTHER PIECES OF DEFENSIVE ARMOUR EMPHASIZES HIS CLOSENESS TO HIS MEN AND HIS DOWN TO EARTH NATURE IT WOULD HAVE BEEN MORE AUTHENTIC FOR ROBB TO WEAR FULL PLATE FULL PLATE WAS HISTORICALLY WORN IN SCANDINAVIA SCOTLAND AND OTHER VERY COLD PLACES EVEN IN WINTER BUT THAT WOULDN'T NECESSARILY HAVE MATCHED THE VISUAL DESIGN DESIRED

THE BANNISTER ARMOUR EMPHASIZES THE POWER AND DOCTRINE OF HOUSE BANNISTER MORE THAN ANY OTHER HOUSE THE INFANTRY IS DEDICATED TO THEM WEARING THEIR COLOURS AND A UNIFORM STYLE OF ARMOUR THAT HOMOGENIZES THEM AND DISTINGUISHES THEM FROM ALL OTHERS

THE REMAINING ARMOUR DIFFERS IN AN ATTEMPT TO VISUALLY DISTINGUISH THE DIFFERENT FACTIONS LEADING TO A SITUATION WHERE ARMOUR IS FAR MORE RADICALLY DIFFERENT FROM REGION TO REGION THAN IN REAL LIFE AS A VISUAL SHORT HAND FOR THE AUDIENCE WHO CAN'T REALLY BE EXPECTED TO NOTICE THE MORE SUBTLE DIFFERENCES THAT TRUE AUTHENTICITY WOULD ENTAIL
STARK ARMOR IS A BRIGANDINE NOT JUST LEATHER THE PATTERN OF RECTANGLES YOU SEE ARE STEEL PLATES IN BETWEEN LAYERS OF LEATHER MANY FOOTMEN PREFERRED BRIGANDINE FOR THEIR TORSO PROTECTION BECAUSE OF THE INCREASED FLEXIBILITY AND COMFORT

MY PROBLEM WITH GOT ARMOR IS THE SCARCITY OF HELMETS IF YOU ONLY WEAR ONE PIECE OF ARMOR IT SHOULD BE ON YOUR FREAKING HEAD
THEIR ARMOUR IS LIKELY BRIGANDINE WITH A GAMBESON UNDERNEATH WHICH IS NEARLY AS GOOD AS PLATE

ITS CERTAINLY NOT POOR ITS A SIGHT EASIER TO REPAIR THOUGH

FOR ME IT'S THE SHEER SCALE OF THE WORLD HORRIBLY HUMAN CHARACTERS HOW DEEPLY FLESHED OUT THE WORLD IS THE COMBAT IS ALSO PRETTY WELL WRITTEN
I THINK THE TWO BIG REASONS ARE THAT IT IS VERY UNFORGIVING IN TERMS OF WRITING AT LEAST FOR THE EARLIER SEASONS AND BOOKS AND THE FACT THERE ARE SO MANY DIFFERENT ELEMENTS THAT ARE BLENDED PRETTY WELL FOR BOTH THE BOOKS AND THE SHOW

AT LEAST FOR ME THIS SERIES SATISFIES A BLOOD LUST I HAVE I'M SO TIRED OF WATCHING READING CLICHE PREDICTABLE STORIES AND THE WAY THIS SERIES IS STRUCTURED PROVIDES A TRUE SENSE OF SUSPENSE ON WHAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN NEXT I LOVE HOW THE STORY TRULY ADHERES TO THE MEDIEVAL LIFESTYLE AND PUTS THE VALUE OF A LIFE MUCH LOWER THAN STANDARDS

IN TERMS OF ELEMENTS GOT AND ASOCIAL JUST ABOUT HAS THEM ALL THIS SERIES HAS STORY LINES THAT ARE JON SNOW MYTHICAL DAENERYS POLITICAL LANDING CERASEIN ADVENTUROUS ARYA AND EVEN A LITTLE BIT OF SCI-FI BRAN THERE'S A LITTLE BIT FOR EVERYONE AND YOU DON'T HAVE TO LOVE IT ALL THAT'S WHY I LIKED READING THE BOOKS EACH CHAPTER WAS A REFRESHING TAKE ON THE WORLD THROUGH EACH OF THE POV CHARACTERS EYES

OVERALL THIS SERIES DOES A GREAT JOB OF APPEALING TO A BROAD AUDIENCE
ONE AWESOME COMMON TRAIT THAT BOTH SHOW AND BOOKS SHARE CLEVER FORESHADOWING

YOU'D READ WATCH ONE PARAGRAPH SCENE WHICH MIGHT SEEM TO NOT CARRY ANY SPECIAL MEANING AT ALL YET IT ACTUALLY IS A DISGUISED HINT TO A BIG PLOT SEVERAL CHAPTERS EPISODES LATER

AND THERE ARE PLENTY OF THEM SO MANY WHICH IS WHY BECOMES EVEN MORE FUN THAN THE FIRST TIME THROUGH
REALISM YES I KNOW THERE ARE DRAGONS AND ICE ZOMBIES BUT WHAT I'M REFERRING TO IS THE FACT THAT EVERY HUMAN ACTION HAS AN ENTIRE STORY LEADING UP TO IT PEOPLE REACT THE WAY THEY REACT NOT BECAUSE IT'S CONVENIENT TO THE PLOT BUT BECAUSE IT'S INHERENT TO THE CHARACTER THAT GARM DEVELOPED AND HE HAS REWRITTEN ENTIRE CHAPTERS TO FIT THE BACKSTORIES OF THE CHARACTERS INVOLVED THERE IS NOT JUST DIALOGUE AND ACTION THERE ARE MOTIVATIONS MISUNDERSTANDINGS INTERNAL CONFLICTS AND MEMORIES THAT ARE ALL SLOWLY REVEALED TO US THROUGH EXPOSITION SAY WHAT YOU WILL ABOUT HIS PROSE AND CHOICE OF LANGUAGE IN SOME PARTS OF THE SERIES BUT GARM CAN WRITE A DAMN GOOD STORY AND ASOCIAL HAS STORY BUILT ON TOP OF STORY BUILT ON TOP OF STORY
IT FEELS A LOT MORE REAL THAN ANY OTHER FANTASY I CAN THINK OF I LOVE LOAR TO DEATH BUT THAT LEVEL OF CONNECTION YOU FEEL IN GOT JUST ISN'T THERE THE CHARACTERS IN LOAR ARE ALL FAIRLY SIMPLE ONE-DIMENSIONAL ATLEAST COMPARED TO GOT WHILE IN GOT YOU GET THESE INCREDIBLY DEEP AND FLESHED OUT CHARACTERS THAT FEEL HUMAN NOBODY IS COMPLETELY EVIL OR COMPLETELY GOOD EVERYONE DOES STUFF FOR AN UNDERSTANDABLE REASON SARON IS EVIL BECAUSE HE IS EVIL TWIN IS EVIL BECAUSE HE PUTS HIS FAMILY AND HIS LEGACY ABOVE EVERYTHING ELSE AND HE DOESN'T COMPROMISE JOFFREY IS EVIL BECAUSE HE IS COMPLETELY INSANE

AND WHEN CHARACTERS COME TOO CLOSE TO THAT BLACK AND WHITE VIEW OF WORLD THEY PAY FOR IT LIKE NED HE WAS THE CLOSEST TO A COMPLETELY GOOD PERSON WE HAD AND IT COST HIM HIS LIFE

SO WHEN YOU SEE THESE MULTIDIMENSIONAL CHARACTERS YOU GET IMMERSED MUCH MORE THAN IN LOAR ESTEROS IS A LIVING BREATHING WORLD THAT OUTSIDE OF THE FANTASY ELEMENTS IS AS REAL AS YOU CAN GET WITH THIS SORT OF SHOW

OF COURSE THERE ARE OTHER PARTS THAT MAKE IT SO GREAT THE UNPREDICTABILITY OF THE STORY THE FACT THAT THERE IS ALMOST NO PLOT ARMOR ETC
REMOVED
I THINK THERE ARE THREE FACTORS

THE CHARACTERS ARE VERY EASY TO RELATE TO AND HAD VERY SET MOTIVATIONS AND GOALS YOU BECOME INSTANTLY ATTACHED AND MOTIVATED TO FOLLOW THE CHARACTERS WHICH DRAWS YOU INTO THE STORY THIS IS ALSO BOLSTERED BY THE PERSPECTIVE WHICH BOTH DRAWS US INTO CHARACTERS AND ENSURES THAT THERE ARE ALWAYS FACES TO THE STORY THAT WE DON'T SEE THIS IS ESPECIALLY TRUE IN THE BOOKS

I AM A BOT AND THIS ACTION WAS PERFORMED AUTOMATICALLY PLEASE CONTACT THE MODERATORS OF THIS SUBREDDIT MESSAGE COMPOSE TO R GAMEOFTHRONES IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS
SO A COUPLE OF THINGS ABOUT MACHIAVELLI SORRY INCOMING WALL OF TEXT

SO THE LINE MOST QUOTED FROM MACHIAVELLI IS SOME VERSION OF FEAR IS BETTER THAN LOVE BUT THAT'S NOT REALLY AN ACCURATE SUMMARY OF HIS WORK WHAT HE IS ADVOCATING IS FAR CLOSER TO RUTHLESS AND UNFLINCHING PRAGMATISM THAN EMBRACING EVIL OR FEAR DIRECTLY

JON I THINK IS ACTUALLY A REALLY BAD EXAMPLE WHEN HE COMES TO POWER AS LORD COMMANDER HE FAILS TO SUCCESSFULLY QUELL DISSENT WITHIN THE WATCH AND IT LEADS TO HIS EVENTUAL ASSASSINATION HIS PUSH FOR WINTERFELL WAS MORE ABOUT HIS RIGHT AND VIRTUE THAN INSTILLING FEAR DESPITE HIS TITLE HIS ABILITY TO HOLD TOGETHER THE NORTHERN ALLIANCE IS ACTUALLY FAR FROM A SURE THING AS HE IS BOLSTERED ONLY BY TRADITION WHICH DIDN'T MUCH HELP ROB NONE OF THIS IS TO SAY HE'S A BAD KING JUST THAT HE'S BEEN KING FOR ABOUT EIGHT MINUTES OF SCREEN TIME AND THAT IS NOT PARTICULARLY TELLING

WHAT WILL BE TELLING IS WHAT HAPPENS NEXT SPECIFICALLY REGARDING ANSA IN REALITY ANSA IS A THREAT TO HIS AUTHORITY WEATHER SHE IS CURRENTLY AGAINST HIM OR NOT SHE HAS THE POTENTIAL TO BE A RALLYING POINT FOR DESCENT SHOULD HIS REIGN BECOME UNPOPULAR LIKEWISE THE OTHER NORTHERN AND VEIL LORDS WHO REALLY HAVE NOTHING BINDING THEM TO HIS WILLIAM

DANNY IS A GREAT EXAMPLE SHE IS REVERED LOVED AND FEARED IN ONE BREATH POWERFUL AND CONFIDENT YET WILLING TO LISTEN TO THOSE AROUND HERALDRY WHAT'S MORE AS THE MAN HIMSELF SAID THE FIRST METHOD FOR ESTIMATING THE INTELLIGENCE OF A RULER IS TO LOOK AT THE MEN S HE HAS AROUND HER AND ANY HAS BOTH ASSEMBLED AND LISTENED TO SOME OF THE MOST CUNNING PEOPLE IN THE WORLD AND HAS TAKEN THEIR OWN COUNCIL ABOVE HERSELF

THE NIGHT KING IS ODD IT'S UNCLEAR HOW INDEPENDENT THE WHITE WALKERS ARE AND WEATHER FEAR IS A TOOL OF HIS CONQUEST OR MERELY A BYPRODUCT WE DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT HIS MOTIVATIONS TO SAY

ADORNE IS KIND OF HARD TO EVALUATE WITH WHAT WE HAVE SEEN THE SAND SNAKES CAME TO POWER WITH THE SUPPORT OF THE PEOPLE BUT THE INTERNAL POLITICAL SYSTEM HAS NOT BEEN SHOWN ENOUGH TO KNOW WHAT THAT REALLY MEANS

LANDING IS EASIER TO QUOTE A WIKIPEDIA ARTICLE SUMMARIZING MACHIAVELLI

CONQUESTS BY CRIMINAL VIRTUE ARE ONES IN WHICH THE NEW PRINCE SECURES HIS POWER THROUGH CRUEL IMMORAL DEEDS SUCH AS THE EXECUTION OF POLITICAL RIVALS MACHIAVELLI ADVISES THAT A PRINCE SHOULD CAREFULLY CALCULATE ALL THE WICKED DEEDS HE NEEDS TO DO TO SECURE HIS POWER AND THEN EXECUTE THEM ALL IN ONE STROKE SUCH THAT HE NEED NOT COMMIT ANY MORE WICKEDNESS FOR THE REST OF HIS REIGN IN THIS WAY HIS SUBJECTS WILL SLOWLY FORGET HIS CRUEL DEEDS AND HIS REPUTATION CAN RECOVER PRINCES WHO FAIL TO DO THIS WHO HESITATE IN THEIR RUTHLESSNESS FIND THAT THEIR PROBLEMS MUSHROOM OVER TIME AND THEY ARE FORCED TO COMMIT WICKED DEEDS THROUGHOUT THEIR REIGN THUS THEY CONTINUOUSLY MAR THEIR REPUTATIONS AND ALIENATE THEIR PEOPLE

SO THERE IS NO DOUBT THAT RISE TO POWER APPLIES THE QUESTION BECOMES PART TWO CAN SHE DISTANCE HERSELF FROM THAT COLOSSAL EVENT AND WIN BACK THE SUPPORT OF THE PEOPLE MACHIAVELLI IS CLEAR ON THIS POINT

A PRINCE MUST ENSURE THAT HE IS NOT FEARED TO THE POINT OF HATRED WHICH IS VERY POSSIBLE

AND THIS IS THE KEY CERASEIN HAS NEVER BEEN POPULAR WITH THE PEOPLE AND APPARENTLY FEELS NO GREAT NEED TO BE SO UNLESS SHE CAN FORGE SOME POLITICAL ALLIES AND KEEP THE PEOPLE BOTH BANNISTER NOBLES AND THE SMALL FOLK FROM REVOLTING THIS PORTION OF THE DISCUSSION IS LIKELY TO BE ACADEMIC
U CONRAN DOES AN EXCELLENT JOB OF EXPLAINING MACHIAVELLI IT'S SO WEIRD I FINISHED THE PRINCE YESTERDAY HAHA


AT ANY RATE JUST TO THROW MY TWO CENTS IN I THINK ANY IS IN A FAR BETTER PLACE ATM THAN ANYONE ELSE IN THE SHOW ONE OF THE THINGS MACHIAVELLI TALKS ABOUT IS HOW NEW PRINCES SHOULD ASSERT THEIR RULE THEY SHOULD UNDERMINE DECEITFULLY OF COURSE LARGER POWERS AND BEFRIEND SMALLER POWERS NOT ONLY IS ANY EXPLICITLY DOING THIS BY ATTACKING THE BANNISTERS MOST POWERFUL AND COMING TOGETHER WITH THE ARTELS GREYJOY AND TRELLAS WEAKER BUT SHE IS USING THEIR ASSISTANCE FROM A POSITION OF EXTREME POWER WHICH IS CRUCIAL MACHIAVELLI MAKES GREAT POINTS ABOUT HOW WEAKER POWERS SHOULD NEVER SEEK THE HELP MILITARY ECONOMIC ETC OF FOREIGN OR BIGGER POWERS AS THIS ALLOWS FOR THEM TO CONTROL AND IMPRISON SOMETIMES EVEN ACQUIRE WHO THEY ASSISTED

THEN THEY HEAR THAT JON SNOW NED BASTARD HAS LET THOUSANDS OF WILDLINGS PAST THE WALL THIS IS AN UNFORGIVABLE BETRAYAL ON THE PART OF THE WATCH BUT HOUSE UMBER WHICH WAS FAMOUSLY LOYAL TO THE STARKS UNTIL THEIR DESTRUCTION CAN'T FIGHT OFF SO MANY WILDLINGS ALONE

PEOPLE ARE CRAPPING THEMSELVES ABOUT HOW BAD THIS WAS BUT IF YOU SPENT EIGHT THOUSAND YEARS FIGHTING WILDLINGS AND ONLY TO HAVE THE WATCH TURN AROUND AND LET THOUSANDS OF THEM INTO THE NORTH YOU'D FEEL COMPELLED TO FIND ALLIES ANY WAY YOU COULD TOO

FROM

AN ARTISTIC RENDERING OF AN ELEMENT OR ELEMENTS IN A FILM TV SHOW OR VIDEO GAME CREATED AS PART OF THE DEVELOPMENT AND VISUALISATION OF CHARACTERS COSTUMES ENVIRONMENTS ETC

FROM WIKIPEDIA

CONCEPT ART IS A FORM OF ILLUSTRATION USED TO CONVEY AN IDEA FOR USE IN FILMS VIDEO GAMES ANIMATION COMIC BOOKS OR OTHER MEDIA BEFORE IT IS PUT INTO THE FINAL PRODUCT

CONCEPT ART IS USED IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF A FINAL PRODUCT IT ISN'T THE FINAL PRODUCT ITSELF THIS IS FAN ART OR SOME OTHER TERM BUT I DON'T THINK IT'S CONCEPT ART
I'M GLAD I'M NOT THE ONLY ONE WHO DOESN'T IMAGINE VALARIA AS SOME VOLCANIC CITY OF DEATH AND DESTRUCTION I VIEW IT AS A LOT MORE ROMAN THEMED WITH PILLARS AND MARBLE ETC

FOUR-LEAF IS CHEWED LIKE CHEWING TOBACCO AND GIVES A SIMILAR MILD NARCOTIC EFFECT HOWEVER FOUR-LEAF CAUSES A PINK FROTH TO FORM ON THE LIPS FROM ITS RED JUICES WHICH IF USED HABITUALLY WILL TURN TEETH BLOOD RED MASHA HEDDLE THE INNKEEPER AT THE CROSSROADS INN IS A HEAVY USER OF FOUR-LEAF THOUGH THIS DIDN'T COME UP IN THE TV SERIES

CAN YOU CLARIFY WHAT YOU MEAN BY MORE IMPORTANT CHARACTER

NO AERY LAUGHED AT TWIN FOR SUGGESTING HIS DAUGHTER MARRY THE CROWN PRINCE

IT'S NOT THAT WEIRD GIVEN THAT THE CITY WAS BEING SACKED ALSO THE ONLY PEOPLE IN THE ROOM WHEN AERY DIED WERE AERY AND JAIME AS JAIME HAD ALREADY KILLED THE PYROMANCER BEFORE HE KILLED AERY

ROBERT IS MADE KING BECAUSE HE WON THE REBELLION HIS TARGARYEN ANCESTRY JUST MADE HIM THE HEAD OF THE REBELLION

IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO REALLY KNOW WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF THE BANNISTERS DIDN'T STAY OUT OF THINGS UNTIL ROBERT HAD WON

THEY WERE ALREADY BETROTHED TO OTHER PEOPLE NAMELY NED STARK AND JON ARLYN
ALRIGHT LET'S DO THIS

THE PREVAILING THEORY IS THAT RHAEGAR AND DYANNA LOVED EACH OTHER AND ELOPED TOGETHER HE WAS CONVINCED THAT THEIR SON WOULD BE THE PRINCE THAT WAS PROMISED HE LIKELY SHIELDED HER FROM THE WORLD ESPECIALLY AFTER SHE BECAME PREGNANT HE LEFT THE KINGSGUARD TO PROTECT NOT JUST DYANNA BUT THEIR SON AS WELL WHO KNOWS HOW MUCH SHE KNEW ABOUT THE REBELLION AND WHAT HAPPENED TO HER FATHER AND BROTHER BY THE TIME RHAEGAR LEFT FOR THE TRIDENT SHE WAS LIKELY ALREADY HEAVILY PREGNANT SHE WOULD NOT HAVE HAD THE TIME NOR THE MEANS TO MAKE A PUBLIC DECLARATION OF THEIR LOVE

2 PUCELLE INSISTED HE WAS LOYAL TO THE BANNISTERS SPECIFICALLY TWIN ALL ALONG HE LIKELY SAW AS TWIN DID THAT THE WAR WAS LOST AND WANTED TO BE ON THE WINNING SIDE PRIMARY INTENTION SEEMED TO BE KEEPING HIS COMFORTABLE POWERFUL POSITION

JON ARLYN WAS TREMENDOUSLY IMPORTANT TO THE HISTORY OF ESTEROS HE SPARKED THE REBELLION BY REFUSING TO HAND ROBERT AND NED WHO HE PRACTICALLY RAISED OVER TO THE MAD KING AND WAS BY ALL ACCOUNTS AN EXCELLENT HAND THOUGH UNABLE TO CONTROL WASTEFUL SPENDING AS FAR AS STATUS HE AND NED WERE EQUALS AS WARDENS OF THE NORTH EAST AND HANDS OF THE KING IN THEIR LIFETIMES HE'S SIMPLY LESS IMPORTANT TO OUR POV OF THE STORY BECAUSE HE DIES BEFORE IT BEGINS

TWIN PROPOSED CERASEIN AS A BRIDE FOR RHAEGAR BUT AERY REFUSED HIM HOWEVER THE EVENT THAT CAUSED TWIN TO RESIGN AS HAND AND LEAVE LANDING WAS AERY APPOINTING JAIME SON AND HEIR TO THE KINGSGUARD EFFECTIVELY DISINHERITING HIM CERASEIN ACTUALLY ENGINEERED THIS TO AVOID BETROTHAL TO ALYSA TULLY AS SHE WANTED MORE INCESTUOUS LOVEMAKING TIME

JAIME WAS THE LAST REMAINING KINGSGUARD THE OTHERS WERE EITHER AT DOJ WITH DYANNA OR HAD BEEN LEADING TROOPS AND WERE NOW DEAD OR CAPTURED AERY HAD BEEN ALONE HE SPECIFICALLY SUMMONED THESE TWO HE ORDERED JAIME TO KILL TWIN AND GOSSART TO BURN LANDING TO THE GROUND

OF THE LEADERS OF THE REBELLION ROBERT WAS MOST CLOSELY RELATED TO THE TARGARYENS SO HE WAS THE OBVIOUS CHOICE TO BE KING THEY'D STARTED THE REBELLION TO OVERTHROW THE MAD KING AND RESCUE DYANNA NONE OF THE REBEL LORDS ROBERT INCLUDED NECESSARILY HAD DESIGNS ON BECOMING KING AT THE OUTSET ROBERT DECLARED HIS INTENTION TO CLAIM THE THRONE SHORTLY BEFORE THE BATTLE OF THE TRIDENT

IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FOR SURE BUT THE LOYALISTS LIKELY WON OUT WITH THE BANNISTERS HELP THE TYRELL ARMIES WERE TIED UP AROUND END AND STORMLANDERS WERE WORN DOWN AFTER BEING PURSUED ALL OVER THE STORM CROWN RIVERLANDS THE BATTLE OF THE TRIDENT WAS ESSENTIALLY STARK ARLYN TULLY VS TARGARYEN MARTELL THE BANNISTER ARMIES COULD HAVE TIPPED THE BALANCE OR EVEN CAUGHT ROBERT BEFORE HE WAS ABLE TO RENDEZVOUS WITH FORCES AT STONEY SEPTEMBER

CATHERYN AND ALYSA WERE BETROTHED TO NED AND JON ON THEIR WAY SOUTH TO MEET UP WITH FORCES IN ORDER TO SECURE HOSTER HELP THEY WERE MARRIED SHORTLY AFTER BEFORE THE TRIDENT AT THAT POINT DYANNA WAS STILL ALIVE AND ROBERT STILL BETROTHED TO HERALDRY
ROBERTS REBELLION STARTED WHEN THE MAD KING KILLED RICKARD STARK AND HIS SON AND THEN DEMANDED THAT JON ARLYN BRINGS HIM BOTH NED AND ROBERT EVEN IF DYANNA LOVED HIM ROBERTS WOULDNT HAVE BACKED DOWN AND HIS HATE WOULD JUST GROW TOWARDS THE TARGARYENS
2 PUCELLE ALWAYS SERVES THE BEST OPTION HE HAS IN FRONT OF HIM THE MAD KINGS DAYS WERE NUMBERED AND HE PROBABLY WANTED TO MAKE A GOOD EXPRESSION ON THE NEXT RULER IN LINE
JON ARLYN IS A VERY BIG CHARACTER BUT WE DONT SEE MUCH OF HIM BECAUSE THE GAME OF THRONES SHOW IS BASED ON THE AFTERMATH OF ALL THESE THINGS JON ARLYN WOULD HAVE BEEN A MUCH BIGGER CHARACTER TO THE AUDIENCE IF THE SHOW WAS BASED ON THE REBELLION INSTEAD
HE HAD MANY REASONS AERY WAS JEALOUS OF TWIN BECAUSE THE PEOPLE CREDITED HIM INSTEAD OF THE KING FOR EVERYTHING THAT WAS HAPPENING AERY JEALOUSY DREW HIM MAD AND HE TOOK JAIME AS HIS KINGS GUARD JUST TO SPITE TWIN AND PREVENT HIM FROM GETTING WHAT HE WANTED JAIME BEING HIS HEIR TWIN ALSO DIDNT CHOOSE SIDES BECAUSE HE DIDNT WANT TO PICK THE LOSING SIDE ONCE THE WAR HAD BEEN DECIDED HE QUICKLY ACTED AND SACKED KINGS LANDING TO MAKE AN IMPACT ON ROBERT


PEOPLE WAS CALLING IT ROBERTS REBELLION BECAUSE HE ENDED UP THE KING WHEN NED CAME TO KINGS LANDING AFTER THE SACKING HE COULD HAVE EASILY TAKEN THE ROLE BUT HE DIDNT WANT IT ROBERT HAVING ARG BLOOD JUST MADE IT EASIER FOR PPL TO OBEY SINCE THEY HAD BEEN RULING FOR AGES JON ARLYN DIDNT WANT TO BECOME KING EITHER BUZ HE HAD NO HEIR ROBERT WAS THE ONLY GUY THAT WANTED IT
THOSE ARE THE BIG NAMES YES BUT ITS MORE FITTING TO SAY THE NORTH THE RIVERLANDS STORMLANDS ETC SINCE THEY HAVE A BUNCH OF LESSER HOUSES FIGHTING FOR THEM ASWELL AND ITS HARD TO SAY WHAT THE OUTCOME WOULD HAVE BEEN BUT ROBERT WOULD HAVE HAD A HARDER TIME WINNING IT ATLEAST

BUT FROM MY PERSPECTIVE TWIN IS FIRST AND FOREMOST A FAMILY MANUAL NOT IN THAT HE LOVES HIS FAMILY BUT THAT HE CARES ABOUT POWER AND MAJESTY OF THE BANNISTER NAME I DON'T THINK TWIN WANTED TO BE ON THE LOSING SIDE OF ANYTHING HE TOOK AERY ABUSES AND HUMILIATIONS FOR YEARS BECAUSE IT WAS THE BEST WAY FOR THE BANNISTER TO MAINTAIN THEIR POWER IT'S WHY HE WANTED TO MARRY CERASEIN TO RHAEGAR BUT THAT DIDN'T HAPPEN OF COURSE WHEN ROBERT AND NED STARTED THEIR REBELLION TWIN DIDN'T JOIN BECAUSE HE KNEW THAT WHATEVER SIDE WON HE WANTED TO BE ON IT SO WHEN HE SAW AERY DEFEAT WAS INEVITABLE HE MADE HIS MOVE AND SACKED LANDING KNOWING THAT PURCELL WOULD LET HIM IN AND TO ENSURE HIS FAMILY WOULDN'T BE PUNISHED FOR THEIR TARDINESS TWIN ORDERED THE DEATH OF CHILDREN AT THE HAND OF THE MOUNTAIN WHO RIDES HE DID SOMETHING HE KNEW ROBERT WOULDN'T HAVE THE STOMACH FOR BUT WOULD KNOW IT WAS NEEDED TO BE DONE IN ONE FELL SWOOP HE MADE HIMSELF AN INVALUABLE ASSET TO THE NEW KING AND POSITIONED HIMSELF SO THAT HE COULD MAKE HIS DAUGHTER QUEEN AND ENSURE THE BANNISTERS WOULD BE THE SECOND HALF OF A NEW DYNASTY

TWIN HATED AERY

THE BOOKS REALLY GO INTO GREAT DETAIL SHOWING THE LENGTHS THAT AERY WENT TO IN SLIGHTING AND BELITTLING THE MAN WHO HAD ONCE BEEN A CLOSE FRIEND TWIN WAS HIS HAND AND MAINTAINED THE REALM FOR HIM YET AERY WOULD REGULARLY INSULT HIM IN FRONT OF THE COURT BERATE HIM IN FRONT OF THE SMALL COUNCIL UNDERCUT HIS POLICIES IN FRONT OF COMMON MERCHANTS DISREGARD HIS ADVICE TO DISASTROUS RESULTS THEN BLAME TWIN FOR THOSE RESULTS GROPED HIS WIFE ON THEIR WEDDING NIGHT INSULTED HIS WIFE AND CHILDREN IN FRONT OF THE WHOLE COURT YOU GET THE IDEA WHEN AERY NAMED JAIME TO THE KINGSGUARD AND REMOVED HIM AS GOLDEN HEIR TO CARTERLY ROCK IT WAS REALLY THE FINAL STRAW

FEW THINGS TO NOTE

THE BOLSONS

THE BOLSONS WERE A UNITING FORCE IN THE NORTHERN PEOPLE HATED THE BOLSONS MORE THEN ANYTHING ELSE THEY FEARED THEM AND WERE ALL LIVING WITH KNIVES AT THEIR THROATS THEY BETRAYED ROBB KILLED THERE FATHERS AND BROTHERS AND SONS AND THEN PARADED AROUND AS IF THEY WERE RIGHTFUL RULERS BECAUSE OF THEIR BETRAYAL JON SNOW ENDED THAT

2 THE WINTER

PEOPLE IN THE NORTH KNOW THAT THINGS ARE CHANGING AND THERE FATHERS AND FOREFATHERS HAVE WARNED THEM FOR GENERATIONS THAT WHEN WINTER COMES ONLY THE STARKS WILL STAND FOR THEM THAT SORT OF INSTITUTIONAL MEMORY IS POWERFUL IN A REGION OF PEOPLE THAT HAVE TRADITIONS THAT RUN DEEP

THE BETRAYAL

THE BETRAYAL OF JON BY THE NIGHTS WATCH ABSOLVED HIM FROM ANY VOWS HE TOOK TO THEM LIKE A CAPTAIN WHO IS BETRAYED BY A MUTINOUS CREW THE CREW STOP BEING THE CAPTAINS DUTY AS SOON AS THEY RISE AGAINST HIM KNOWING THAT HE WAS BETRAYED WOULD ALSO REINFORCE POINT THE BOLSONS

IT'S SIMPLE NO ONE GIVES A SHIT ABOUT THE WATCH THAT'S WHY THEY HAVE BEEN FORCED TO RECRUIT CRIMINALS IN ORDER TO JUST HAVE MEN
THE SHOW DOESN'T DEPICT TIME THAT WELL I DON'T THINK BUT I CAN ONLY IMAGINE WORD GOT OUT ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED A MAN BEING STABBED TO DEATH ESPECIALLY LORD COMMANDER AND BEDS SON THEN BEING BROUGHT BACK TO LIFE DEFINITELY GOT OUT

HE WAS STABBED AND SEEMINGLY THE NEXT DAY WAS REVIVED BUT IF I REMEMBER CORRECTLY ALL OF THIS WAS BEFORE HE WENT TO GO TALK TO THE LORDS TO JOIN HIS FIGHT FOR WINTERFELL I AM SURE THE CONVERSATION CAME UP AND THESE LORDS KNEW ABOUT IT

I THINK IT'S MEANT TO REINFORCE TRUE BRUTAL NATURE HE MEETS IN ESSENCE HIS POLAR OPPOSITE AND THEN IS IMMEDIATELY SHOWN HOW INEFFECTIVE BEING A PACIFIST WORKS OUT IN THIS WORLD ESTEROS IS NOT MEANT FOR THE FAINT HEARTED CLEANSE NOW HAS HATRED FILLED UP BACK IN HIS HEART HE WASN'T CHANGED NECESSARILY AFTER HIS NEAR DEATH EXPERIENCE BUT IF THERE WAS ANY DOUBT ON FORGING A NEW PATH OF PEACE IT HAS NOW ALL BEEN LOST
ON THE CONTRARY I THINK THE WRITING WAS EXCELLENT THE HOUND RAN AWAY FROM A GOOD CHUNK OF HIS IDENTITY AND WAS THEN BEATEN BY A WOMAN IN COMBAT EFFECTIVELY STRIPPING HIM OF ALL SENSE OF SELF BUT HE IS TOUGH AND A SURVIVOR HE STUMBLES ON A GROUP THAT REPRESENT A POTENTIAL FUTURE FOR HIM THEY DON'T SHARE IDEALS BUT THEY AREN'T HUMILIATING HIM OR ASKING HIM TO DO DISHONORABLE THINGS CONSTANTLY EITHER DANGER COMES AND KILLS THIS GROUP AND ALSO KILLS THIS NEW PATH FOR THE HOUND ON THE OTHER HAND IT DOES GIVE THE HOUND A NEW PURPOSE JUSTICE AND HE SEEKS THAT IN THE ONLY WAY HE KNOWS HOW

THE HOUND IS EVOLVING AND THE INTERACTION WITH BROTHER RAY'S GROUP SHOWS THAT HE'S GOING FROM A SELFISH CHARACTER TO ONE WHO SEEKS JUSTICE FOR OTHERS IN FACT IT SEEMS AS THOUGH HE'S PICKING UP SOME TRAITS FROM BIENNE
IN ADDITION TO HIS ROLE IN FURTHERING THE STORY HE CAN BE SEEN AS A FOIL FOR THE HIGH SPARROW BROTHER RAY SAID THAT HE DIDN'T TRULY KNOW THE GODS BECAUSE NO MAN COULD HE SAID THAT YOU COULD NEVER TRULY KNOW THE WILL OF THE GODS AND YOU JUST HAD TO DO THE BEST YOU CAN IN LIVING YOUR LIFE THE HIGH SPARROW ON THE OTHER HAND SPEAKS OF THE GODS IN AN ALMOST ARROGANT WAY HE CLAIMS TO KNOW THE GODS AND WHAT THEIR WILL IS HE DARES TO SPEAK FOR THE GODS AS IF HE KNOWS THEM PERSONALLY

BROTHER RAY IS A GOOD HUMBLE MANUAL THE HIGH SPARROW IS AN ARROGANT MAN WHO SEEKS TO BE SEEN AS HUMBLE WHILE AT THE SAME TIME CLAIMING THAT HE KNOWS THE WAY AND THAT EVERYONE MUST FOLLOW HIM
I THINK THAT WITHOUT RAY'S WORDS IF THE HOUND WAS GUIDED TO THE BROTHERHOOD BY OTHER MEANS HE WOULD HAVE BEEN DISINTERESTED UNLIKE HOW IT TURNED OUT IN THE SHOW
THE WORLD WAS BUILT BY KILLERS SO YOU D BETTER GET USED TO LOOKING AT THEM
I THINK IT WAS JUST TO SHINE ANOTHER LITTLE LONGER THIS TIME WITH DIALOGUE LIGHT ON THE GOOD SIDE HE'S A BIG SOFTY JUST KIND OF HARDENED BY HIS CIRCUMSTANCES FORCED INTO THIS RUTHLESS KILLING MACHINE IT'S ALL HE'S EVER BEEN GOOD AT IN HIS OWN WORDS BUT DOES HE REALLY ENJOY IT

HAVING A CHARACTER WHO DIDN'T KNOW HIM AS THE HOUND OR AT LEAST DIDN'T FEAR HIM DUE TO HIS SPIRITUAL BELIEFS OPENED UP CONVERSATIONS IN A BARE FRANK TONE WE'RE NOT USED TO SEEING FROM CLEANSE THOSE MOMENTS BEFORE SAVING ANSA TWICE FLEETING GLIMPSES WITH ARYA HIS RECOIL AT THE FLAMES DURING BLACKWATER BAY ETC DIDN'T OFFER MUCH MORE THAN IMPLICATIONS AND BRIEF ONES AT THAT I'M SURE IT WAS ALSO TO FURTHER HIS STORYLINE SOLIDIFY OR GIVE NEW CONVICTION TO HIS CHARACTER OBVIOUSLY THAT'S JUST HOW I INTERPRETED THE PLOT POINT

ALSO IT'S BEEN A LONG TIME SINCE I SAW THAT EPISODE ARC IT'S VERY LATE AT NIGHT SO HOPEFULLY I MADE SOME SENSE BE KIND
IN THE SHOW BROTHER RAY IS MEANT TO REPRESENT A COUPLE OF THINGS FIRST HE DESCRIBED HOW VIOLENT HE WAS IN THE PAST AND HOW HE HAD DETACHED MORE FROM HIS EMOTIONS TO BECOME AN UNFEELING TOOL OF OPPRESSION HE MURDERED STOLE RAPED AND BURNED ALL IN THE NAME OF SOME AUTHORITY THAT HE REALLY HAD NO CONNECTION TO OTHER THAN BEING BORN IN A PARTICULAR PLACE

SECOND BROTHER RAY SHOWS THAT A HUMAN TRANSFORMATION IS POSSIBLE EVEN FROM THE MONSTER THAT HE HAD BECOME THEY ARE VERY EXPLICIT ABOUT HIS ATTITUDE TOWARDS VIOLENCE NOW AND THAT HE WILL NEVER USE IT TO CONFRONT ANY PROBLEM YOU DON'T CURE THE DISEASE OF VIOLENCE WITH MORE VIOLENCE SOMETHING LIKE THAT ANYWAY

THE HOUND WAS VERY MUCH LIKE BROTHER RAY WHEN HE WAS WORKING FOR THE BANNISTERS HE WAS A GOOD SOLDIER THAT DID THE BIDDING OF HIS MASTERS NO MATTER THE VIOLENCE INVOLVED HE SERVED THEM AND USED THAT STATION TO GET PAYBACK ON THE WORLD FOR HOW HE HAD BEEN TREATED SINCE HE WAS A CHILD THEY ALWAYS KEPT JUST A TOUCH OF HIS HUMANITY FOR US TO SEE THOUGH LIKE HOW HE HELPED ANSA ON A COUPLE OF OCCASIONS

THE HOUND LOSES HIS FIGHT WITH BIENNE AND ALMOST DIES HE IS TAKEN IN BY FOLKS THAT WHILE A LITTLE AFRAID DO NOT JUDGE HIM FOR HIS PAST DEEDS HE IS FORGIVEN BY THIS GROUP HE GROWS TO LOVE THE COMMUNITY AND THEY BEGIN TO FEEL LIKE A FAMILY TO HIM

WHEN SANDOR DISCOVERS THAT HIS NEW FAMILY HAS BEEN MURDERED BY THE BW HE TAKES ACTION WHY DOES HE TAKE ACTION WHEN IT WOULD APPEAR THAT ALL OF THE TEACHING OF BROTHER RAY ARE AGAINST IT I'LL TELL YOU WHY

BROTHER RAY WITH HIS DEATH WAS AN EXAMPLE TO SANDOR THAT THOSE WHO WILL NOT FIGHT EVIL ARE DOOMED TO SUFFER AT THE HANDS OF EVIL MEN DOING NOTHING IS AS BAD AND AS DANGEROUS AS BEING THE PERPETRATORS OF EVIL FOR EVIL TO GROW ALL IT TAKES IF FOR GOOD MEN TO DO NOTHING

SANDOR DECIDES TO DO SOMETHING BECAUSE HE IS A FUNDAMENTALLY CHANGED MANUAL HE IS NO LONGER THE UNFEELING OBEDIENT DOG AND HE CAN NEVER BE ONE THAT SHIES AWAY FROM FIGHTING FOR WHAT IS RIGHT HE THEREFORE DOES NOT JUST GO OUT TO GET REVENGE BUT TO STOP THE EVIL MEN THAT CAUSED THIS HARM SO THEY CANNOT VISIT IT ON OTHER PEOPLE REVENGE IS A BONUS BUT NOT HIS TRUE MOTIVATION

THAT'S HOW I SEE IT ANYWAY
YEAH THE WHOLE YOU CAN'T ANSWER VIOLENCE WITH VIOLENCE THING HE TOLD CLEANSE SEEMS UTTERLY MEANINGLESS WHEN HE PROCEEDS TO KILL GUYS ESPECIALLY WHEN 2 OF THEM ARE RANDOM GUYS CLEANSE HAS NEVER SEEN BEFORE HE'S STILL GRUFF AND HOUNDY

BUT HIS ARC IS SIMPLER IN THE SERIES THE DUMBING DOWN IS BOUND TO HAPPEN WITH SUCH COMPLEX BOOKS HE DOES SEEM SLIGHTLY MORE SINCERE HE'S OBVIOUSLY UPSET ABOUT THE RAY AND CO REFERRING TO HIM AS A FRIEND WANTING TO AVENGE THEM THE HOUND WOULDN'T HAVE GONE ABOUT IT THE SAME WAY
I THINK BROTHER RAY IS AN EXAMPLE OF WHAT CAN BECOME OF SANDOR IF HE CHOSE THAT PATH AND YOU CAN SEE WHERE IT LEAD FOR RAY SANDOR CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT FOR GOOD YOU SEE HIS GOOD INTENTIONS FROM TIME TO TIME SAVING ANSA AND ARYA BUT IN THE END HE CAN'T CHANGE WHAT HE IS A TRAINED AND DEADLY KILLER I THINK HE KNOWS THAT AND MAYBE JUST MAYBE HE CAN GET SOME REDEMPTION FOR HIS LIFE AND DO SOME GOOD EVEN IF THAT GOOD IS KILLING BAD PEOPLE
I WISH WE GOT A FEW MORE EPISODES WITH BROTHER RAY AND THE HOUND TOGETHER HAVE THE HOUND START TO BUILD TRUST IN WHAT BROTHER RAY WAS SAYING AND MAYBE START TO BELIEVE HE COULD LEAVE THE VIOLENT TIMES BEHIND AND THEN MAYBE 2 OR EPISODES AFTER THEN THE BROTHERHOOD KILL BROTHER RAY AND THE PEOPLE BUILDING THE SEPTEMBER I FELT FOR IT ALL TO BE IN ONE EPISODE WAS KIND OF RUSHED AND COULD OF DONE WITH BEEN A BIT LONGER

SOURCE YEARS STUDYING BEMA HISTORICAL EUROPEAN MARTIAL ARTS LONG SWORD WHILE BEING SLIGHTLY BELOW AVERAGE HEIGHT I'M FOOT INCHES TALL MEANING NEARLY ALL MY SPARRING PARTNERS ARE TALLER THAN ME

ALSO JUST A BEING A NITPICKY SWORD NERD WHAT THE MOUNTAIN USES IS NOT A BROADSWORD A BROADSWORD IS A VERY SPECIFIC TYPE OF ONE HANDED SCOTTISH SWORDSMITH A BASKET HILT A GOOD EXAMPLE IS SEEN IN THE FILM ROB ROY OR THE SWORD USED IN THE SHOW OUTLANDER

THE SWORDS USED BY THE MOUNTAIN WOULD BE CONSIDERED A GREATSWORD ZWEIHANDER IN GERMAN MONTANTE IN SPANISH AND IS ACTUALLY A EARLY RENAISSANCE WEAPON THE WEIGH ONLY ABOUT POUNDS FOR BATTLEFIELD VERSIONS THE HEALY HEAVY ONES IN MUSEUMS ARE BEARING SWORDS USED FOR CEREMONIES ICE IS ALSO A GREATSWORD THE MOUNTAIN IS SO BIG THAT HE CAN USE IT LIKE A LONGWORD

MOST OF THE OTHER SWORD ON THE SHOW ARE ONE HANDED KNIGHTLY SWORDS MODERNLY CALLED ARMING SWORDS THINK THE SWORD ROBB STARK USES OR SHOW VERSION OF WATCHKEEPER AND HAND AND HALF ARE ALSO CALLED BASTARD LONGSWORDS LONG CLAW IS GOOD EXAMPLE

THE BOOKS CONFUSE THINGS BY USING LONGWORD FOR WHAT ARE REALLY ARMING SWORDS WHICH IS PROBABLY INFLUENCED FROM MARTIN HAVING PLAYED TABLETOP RAGS LIKE DUNGEONS AND DRAGONS WHERE ONE HANDED SWORDS WERE CALLED LONGSWORDS BECAUSE THE GAMES FEATURE SHORT-SWORD THINK GLADIUS OR SIPHNOS LENGTH SWORDS

RIVERRUN WAS BUILT ON A RIVER UNLESS ACCESS TO THE RIVER WAS CUT OFF THE CASTLE COULD BE AND HOLD OUT INDEFINITELY THERE WAS NO CHANCE OF A RELIEF FORCE SO THE FLEYS AND BANNISTERS WOULDN'T NEED TO BUILD A CONTRAVALLATION TO HOLD OUT A RELIEF FORCE SO A CIRCUMVALLATION WOULD BE BUILT TO CONFINE THE BESIEGED IN THEIR CASTLE THEN A FLEET OF BOATS WOULD BE ORGANIZED TO BLOCK THE RIVER POSSIBLY ALONG WITH A CHAIN OR ROPE TO BLOCK ACCESS TO THE CASTLE WHEN JAIMIE AND BRON ARRIVED WITH THE BANNISTER TROOPS THE FLEYS HAD DONE LITTLE TO PREPARE FOR AN ACTUAL SIEGE BRON GOT THEM DIGGING THEIR CIRCUMVALLATION BUT THE REAL EFFORT WAS ORGANIZING THE FREY CAMP FORTIFY IT AND ENSURE THEIR WERE PROPER LATRINES AND ACCESS TO CLEAN WATER NO FEUDAL LORDS WOULD BE AS CLUELESS AS THE FREY BROTHERS SEEMED TO BE BUT IT GAVE THE WRITERS A CHANCE TO CONFIRM JAIMIE AND BRON AS REAL SOLDIERS VERSUS THE CLUMSY DISORGANIZED FLEYS AGAIN THE BESIEGER ONCE DUG IN IF NOT INTERESTED IN CONDUCTING ASSAULTS DID NOT HAVE TO THE BESIEGED FORCES IF THE BLACKFISH HAD GATHERED MEN THE FLEYS COULD CONDUCT THE SIEGE WITH A SIMILAR NUMBER THAT WAS IF ALL THINGS WERE EQUAL AND THEY ARE NOT THE TULLY FORCES ARE LED BY A LEGENDARY LEADER HIGH MORALE CASTLE WALLS FROM WHICH TO FIGHT FROM AND PLENTY OF SUPPLIES THE FLEYS HAVE LITTLE EFFECTIVE LEADERSHIP SHOW LITTLE DISCIPLINE OR SKILL AND HAVE TO BE SUPPLIED FROM THE STOCKS OF THE RIVER LANDS AN AREA ALREADY FOUGHT OVER BY ARMIES AND SO STRIPPED OF FOOD AND FODDER THE BLACKFISH COULD SALLY FORTH ESPECIALLY BY BOAT CAPTURE FREY FORTIFICATIONS AND SIEGE ENGINES KILL FREY TROOPS AND LOWER THEIR MORALE FURTHER SINCE FEUDAL TROOPS SERVED FOR DAYS UNLESS PAID AND THE BANNISTERS ARE BROKE AND GOVERNMENT IN DEBT THE FLEYS WOULD HAVE TO ROTATE THEIR LEVIES THROUGH THE SIEGE WHICH WOULD LIMIT THE SIZE OF THEIR FORCE IF THE FLEYS CAN RAISE MEN AT DAYS THEY COULD ONLY RAISE MEN AT A TIME AT DAYS THEY COULD RAISE AT A TIME WHICH MEANS THAT THEY WOULD HAVE LITTLE LEFT OVER TO SCREEN THE BORDER WITH THE NORTH WHERE THE HOUSES HAVE RALLIED AROUND THE STARKS AGAIN OR PROVIDE A MOBILE FORCE TO OPPOSE THE VALE OR ANY THREAT FROM THE REACH

WITHOUT JAIMIE AND OR BRON TO PROVIDE LEADERSHIP AND A BACKBONE OF BANNISTER PROFESSIONAL TROOPS THE BLACKFISH WOULD TEAR THE FREY LEVIES UP EVENTUALLY BREAKING THE SIEGE AND FORCING THE FLEYS BACK ON THE TWINS OR INTO A BATTLE ON OPEN TERRAIN HE COULD DENY ACCESS TO THE NORTH AND THE VALE OR PROVIDE THEM ACCESS TO THE CROWN LANDS AND THE REACH HE COULD CUT OFF THE CROWN LANDS FROM THE REACH AND THE BANNISTERS FROM THEIR BANNERMEN AND MEN-AT-ARMS HE COULD SECURE ACCESS TO THE CROWN LANDS BY THE TRELLAS AND ADORNE EVEN WITHOUT DABNEYS ARMY AND VERY IMPORTANT HERE TOLMEN HAD COMMANDED JAIMIE AFTER DISMISSING HIM FROM THE GUARD TO TAKE RIVERRUN BACK JAIMIE CANNOT JUST DISOBEY A ROYAL COMMAND IF HE HADN'T LEVERAGED DEMURE INTO GIVING HIM THE CASTLE HE AND HIS TROOPS WOULD HAVE BEEN STUCK THERE UNTIL THE SIEGE ENDED ONE WAY OR THE OTHER

FOR SEASON THE AUDIO COMMENTARY TRACKS DID NOT PLAY AND ONLY THE SURROUND SOUND WOULD PLAY

I FIXED THIS BY GOING INTO MY PLAYERS SOUND SETTINGS AND TURNING THE SETTING KNOWN AS SECONDARY AUDIO FROM OFF TO ON

MY PLAYER IS A PANASONIC HOME THEATRE SYSTEM AND I ACCESSED THE SECONDARY AUDIO BY DOING THE FOLLOWING



TURN ON BTU RAY PLAYER MAKE SURE NO DISC IS INSIDE THE PLAYER AND UPDATE TO BTU RAY PLAYER FIRST
2 AFTER UPDATING ENTER THE SETTINGS MENU FROM THE HOME SCREEN OF THE BTU RAY PLAYER
SELECT SOUND
SELECT DIGITAL AUDIO OUTPUT
SET SECONDARY AUDIO TO ON



HOPE THIS HELPS ANYONE WHO RAN INTO THE SAME ISSUES AS ME WHEN AUDIO COMMENTARY TRACKS ARE RECORDED SOMETIMES THEY ARE RECORDED AND MERGED WITH THE ACTUAL AUDIO OF THE EPISODE AS FLAT TRACKS AND OTHER TIMES THEY ARE ACTUALLY 2 DIFFERENT AUDIO STREAMS IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN SOUND QUALITY IF YOUR BTU RAY PLAYER IS NOT SET TO PROCESS BOTH SOUND LAYERS THEN THAT IS WHY YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO LISTEN TO BOTH SOUND TRACKS

ANOTHER INTERESTING FORESHADOWING

DIREWOLF SEYMERIA

IS NAMED AFTER A RULING QUEEN WHO SENT PETTY KINGS TO THE WALL AND WAS A CUNNING COMMANDER AND FOUGHT SEVERAL REBELLIONS SHE RULED A KINGDOM FOR YEARS AND MARRIED SEVERAL TIMES INCLUDING A SWORD OF THE MORNING FROM HOUSE DAYNE

DIREWOLF LADY

IS NAMED AFTER HER STRONGEST CHARACTER TRAIT BEING A LADY

NED SPEAKS TO BOTH GIRLS ABOUT THEIR FUTURES

HE TELLS ARYA SHE WILL MARRY A KING MAKING HER A QUEEN LIKE HER DIREWOLF
HE TELLS ANSA SHE WILL MARRY A HIGH LORD MAKING HER A LADY LIKE HER DIREWOLF


GEORGE CONFIRMED AGCT HAS THE MOST FORESHADOWING OF ANY IN THE SERIES
SUMMER DIES WHEN WINTER STARTS SHAGGY DOG IS NAMED AFTER A LONG WINDED IRRELEVANT AND TYPE OF STORY LIKE STORY ARC ENDS UP BEING

THE STORYLINE IN THE NORTH REMAINS THE SAME UP TO THE BOB WHERE BANNISTER TROOPS THE KNIGHTS BUT NOT ENOUGH TO PREVENT JON WINNING SO THE TWIN FACES A UNITED NORTH UNDER THE KING IN THE NORTHERN HE HAS TO DEPLOY BANNISTER TROOPS TO WATCH THE NORTH AND SECURE THE RIVER LANDS
AND ARCS STAY THE SAME WITH LF MURDERING ALYSA AND BECOMING LORD PROTECTOR OF THE VALE AND ANSA REUNITING WITH JON THE HOUND AND ARC STAY THE SAME
THE RIVER LANDS STORY LINE STAYS THE SAME WITH THE BANNISTERS RESCUING THE FLEYS JAIMIE PRYING THE TALLYS OUT OF RIVERRUN AND DEMURE BACK IN THE DUNGEON ARYA STILL KILLS WALDER AND HIS TWO SONS TWIN NOW FACES UNCERTAINTY IN THE RIVER LANDS AND HAS TO ONCE AGAIN SEND JAIMIE AND BANNISTER TROOPS
THE STORM LANDS ARE IN CHAOS WITH THE END OF HOUSE BARATHRON SO TWIN HAS TO COMMIT TROOPS TO SECURE ORDER SO THAT TAXES CAN BE COLLECTED AND TROOPS LEVIED
THE REACH IS SECURED BY THE TRELLAS WHO PROVIDE THE FORCES LED BY MACE TYRELL NEEDED TO FACE OFF AGAINST ADORNE
THE ADORNE STORYLINE CONTINUES WITH MARCELLA POISONED AFTER JAIMIE AND RESCUE ATTEMPT AND ELLERIAN SAND AND THE SAND SNAKES TAKING CONTROL OF AN INDEPENDENT ADORNE WHICH TWIN MUST DEAL WITH
THE BANNISTERS ARE BROKE AND THE GOVERNMENT IS DEEP IN DEBT ONLY THE FUNDING IS SERVICING THE DEBT AND KEEPING THE IRON BANK AT REACH WITHOUT THE PAYMENTS THE BANK MIGHT BUY MERCENARIES FOR DABNEYS OR JON TO TAKE THE IRON THRONE
THE IRON ISLAND STORY LINE STAYS THE SAME WITH AARA AND THEON STEALING SHIPS TO JOIN DABNEYS STORM-WORN AND EFRON BUILDING A NEW FLEET AND CHASING AFTER THEM RAIDING THE COAST OF THE REACH AND ADORNE SACKING OLDTOWN CAUSES DISRUPTIONS FOR BOTH THE TRELLAS AND THE SAND SNAKES PLANS
FINALLY DABNEYS STORM-WORN STILL SAILS WITH UNSULLIED AND DOTHRAKI SHE IS SUPPORTED BY THE SAND SNAKES AND ADORNE BUT THE TRELLAS AND THE REACH ARE STILL LOYAL TO THE THRONE
TWIN IS GOOD AS A STRATEGIST AND AS A GENERAL AND AS A MANAGER BUT HE JUST DOESN'T HAVE THE RESOURCES TO DEAL WITH THE NORTHERN TROUBLES AND THE RETURN OF THE STARKS THE BLACKFISH CAUSING TROUBLE IN THE RIVER LANDS THE IRON BANK WANTING ITS MONEY EFRON RAIDING THE WESTERN AND SOUTHERN COASTS OF ESTEROS THE CHAOS IN THE STORM LANDS THE REBELLION OF ADORNE AND DABNEYS STORM-WORN RETURNING TO ESTEROS

CATHERYN IS ACTUALLY CALLED CATHERYN STARK MOST OF THE TIME IT SEEMS THAT THE QUEEN PRINCESSES OF THE IRON THRONE DON'T ADOPT THE SURNAME ELIA MARGERY CERASEIN FOR WHATEVER REASON I DON'T KNOW BUT LADIES STILL ADOPT THE SURNAME WHEN MARRYING MEMBERS OF A MAIN HOUSE CATHERYN GLENNA
PEOPLE WHO MARRY WITH THE MEMBERS OF THE ROYAL FAMILY DOESN'T GET THE NAME OF THE ROYAL FAMILY BECAUSE THEY DO NOT HAVE THE BLOOD THAT'S WHY CERASEIN IS NEVER A BARATHRON AND ELIA IS NEVER A TARGARYEN

FOR THE REST OF ESTEROS ALMOST ALWAYS WOMEN GET THE NAME OF THEIR HUSBANDS BUT IF THEY COME FROM PROMINENT FAMILIES THEMSELVES AND ARE KNOWN FOR THEIR PERSONA IT IS NOT UNCOMMON FOR THEM TO BE STILL CALLED BY THEIR MAIDEN NAMES BY SOME PEOPLE HOUSE TULLY IS AN IMPORTANT HOUSE AS THEY ARE THE LORD PARAMOUNT OF RIVERLANDS AND CATHERYN IS KNOWN BY RIVERLORDS AS THE DAUGHTER OF THEIR LIEGE LORD HOSTER TULLY FIRST AND ANYTHING ELSE SECOND THAT'S WHY SOMETIMES WALDER FREY CALLS HER CATHERYN TULLY


AND THEN SOMETIMES THERE IS THE CASE THAT WOMEN KEEP THEIR MAIDEN NAMES AND PASS IT ONTO THEIR CHILDREN WHEN THEIR HUSBANDS ARE LOWBORN UNLEGITIMIZED BASTARDS OR WHEN THE COUPLE AGREES TO DO IT IN AN EFFORT TO MAKE SURE THE WOMAN'S FAMILY NAME SURVIVES OR IF THE WOMAN JUST HAS THE MUCH MORE PRESTIGIOUS NAME AND MAN DOESN'T BOTHER DROPPING HIS TO GIVE HIS CHILDREN A BETTER STANDING SOMETIMES WOMEN ARE JUST IN TOO HIGH OF A POSITION THEN THEY CAN JUST OUTRIGHT HAVE IT A GIVEN THAT THEIR NAME GETS PASSED DOWN THIS IS HOW HOUSE MARTELL REMAINED AS MARTELL DESPITE GOING THROUGH SEVERAL FEMALE RULERS


ALSO PRINCESSES OF ROYAL BLOOD DO NOT LET GO OF THEIR MAIDEN NAMES OR TAKE THEIR HUSBAND'S NAMES CHADELLE TARGARYEN DIDN'T BECOME CHADELLE BARATHRON RHAENYS TARGARYEN DIDN'T BECOME RHAENYS VELARYON RHAENYRA TARGARYEN DIDN'T BECOME RHAENYRA VELARYON ADELLA TARGARYEN DIDN'T BECOME ADELLA ARLYN ELAENIA TARGARYEN DIDN'T BECOME ELAENIA PLUM PENROSE MANWOODY ETC

WHEN A LORD MARRIES A LADY THE LADY TAKES THE LORD'S NAME WHEN TWO FAMILIES CONJOIN TO FORM THE ROYAL FAMILY THEY KEEP THEIR NAMES AND THE KIDS TAKE BOTH OR EITHER
SHE WAS THE QUEEN OF THE SEVEN KINGDOMS THEY GET TO KEEP THE NAME OF THEIR HOUSE THAT'S WHY JOFFREY WAS ALWAYS INTRODUCED AS BEING OF THE HOUSES BARATHRON AND BANNISTER
I THINK IT IS RELATED TO THE POWER OF THE TWO FAMILIES IN QUESTION BANNISTER IS THE MOST POWERFUL FAMILY IN ESTEROS AND SO CERASEIN KEEPS HER NAME AND IS NEVER CALLED CERASEIN BARRATHEON TULLY AND STARK ARE PRETTY EVENLY MATCHED AND SO YOU SOMETIMES HEAR CATHERYN TULLY
ANOTHER EXAMPLE IS WHEN THEY REFER TO JOFFREY THEY SAY HE IS FROM THE HOUSES OF BOTH BARRATHEON AND BANNISTER AGAIN HIGHLIGHTING THE POWER OF THE BANNISTERS
I THINK THEY USE OUR DEFINITION OF A YEAR SINCE EVERYBODY STILL AGES AND SUCH ONLY THEIR SEASONS ARE IRREGULAR BECAUSE OF MAGIC
I THINK THEY DO LIKE WE'VE DONE ON EARTH FOR MILLENNIA THAT IS DEFINE YEARS BY THE REVOLUTIONS OF THE STARS RATHER THAN BY SEASONS
WHAT IS THE CYCLE OF A YEAR WHY DO THEY COUNT YEARS WHEN SEASONS ARE STRANGE

GARM TWELVE MOON TUNS TO A YEAR AS ON EARTH EVEN ON OUR EARTH YEARS HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SEASONS OR WITH THE CYCLES OF THE MOON A YEAR IS A MEASURE OF A SOLAR CYCLE OF HOW LONG IT TAKES THE EARTH TO MAKE ONE COMPLETE REVOLUTION AROUND THE SUN THE SAME IS TRUE FOR THE WORLD OF ESTEROS SEASONS DO NOT COME INTO IT


MY TAKE ON THE SEASONS IS THAT THEY'RE LIKE ICE AGES OR EPOCHS A YEAR IS STILL A YEAR ALTHOUGH THE CLIMATE IS MORE MODERATE ALL YEAR ROUND AND EVERY SO OFTEN YOU GET A WINTER OR A MINI ICE AGE THAT LASTS SEVERAL YEARS OR EVEN GENERATIONS
THEY'LL ALSO DEFINE A YEAR AS THE TIME IT TAKES FOR ONE REVOLUTION OF THE WORLD AROUND THE SUN WHICH YOU CAN DETERMINE BY OBSERVING THE SUN'S PATH ACROSS THE SKY OR THE STARS

OF COURSE THE MOVEMENT OF THE WORLD AROUND THE SUN COMBINED WITH THE TILTED AXIS OF THE ROTATION OF THE WORLD IS WHAT CAUSES SEASONS BUT TO ASSUME THAT WHATEVER MAKES THE SEASONS SO IRREGULAR ON PLANETS ACTUALLY INFLUENCES THOSE IS PRETTY PREPOSTEROUS PHYSICALLY SPEAKING THEN OF COURSE IT'S FICTION

THEN THERE'S TWO POSSIBILITIES

AXIS OF ROTATION IS NOT TILTED NORMALLY THAT MEANS IT WOULD NOT HAVE SEASONS THOSE IT DOES HAVE MUST THEREFORE BE DUE TO SOME OTHER MECHANISM WHICH DOESN'T NEED TO BE TIED TO ORBITAL MECHANICS IN ANY WAY AND CAN THEREFORE EASILY BE IRREGULAR THE PROBLEM IS THAT WITHOUT A TILTED AXIS IT BECOMES MUCH HARDER TO TELL THE LENGTH OF A YEAR THE SUN WILL ALWAYS HAVE THE SAME PATH ACROSS THE SKY ONLY THE NEAREST STARS WILL WOBBLE A LITTLE BIT IT'S UNLIKELY A MEDIEVAL SOCIETY WOULD NOTICE THAT AND MAKE IT THE BASIS OF THEIR COMMON TIMEKEEPING
AXIS IS TILTED AND IT WOULD HAVE NORMAL SEASONS BUT SOMETHING ELSE IS ABLE TO OVERRIDE THEM PARTIALLY NOT AS CRAZY AS CHANGING ORBITAL MECHANICS BUT STILL IMPRESSIVE

THE MOST REALISTIC EXPLANATION IS PROBABLY THAT THE AXIS TILT IS LESS THAN SO NORMALLY THE SEASONAL DIFFERENCES WOULD BE WEAKER THAN OURS AND THUS EASIER TO OVERRIDE BUT THERE WOULD STILL BE EASILY OBSERVABLE ASTRONOMICAL CHANGES

YEAR AND SEASONS ARE INDEPENDENT FROM EACH OTHER

YEAR DEPENDS ON TIME WHEN PLANET TURNS AROUND THE STAR EARTH TURNS AROUND THE SUN IN DAYS GOT PLANET MAY HAVE A YEAR EVEN OF DAYS EAST G MARTIAN YEAR IS FAR LONGER THAN SOLAR YEAR

SEASON MAY DEPEND ON PLANET'S TILT LIKE THE CASE WITH EARTH OR PLANET'S ORBIT EAST G NOT CIRCULAR BUT ELLIPTICAL ORBIT WHERE A PLANET APPROACHES THE STAR CLOSER OR ON OTHER FACTORS

START BY ACTUALLY WATCHING THE REST OF THE SHOW IF YOU'RE INTERESTED IN MORE AFTER THAT READ THE BOOKS AND IF YOU'RE STILL INTERESTED IN MORE AFTER THAT THERE ARE TONS OF FAN THEORIES AND OTHER RESOURCES AVAILABLE ON THE WEB

I WOULD ESTIMATE THAT THE SHOW CAPTURES ROUGHLY OF THE STORY BEING TOLD IN THE BOOKS AND OF THE NUDITY WHICH IS SIMPLY THE WAY IT GOES WHEN CONVERTING SOMETHING OF THAT SCALE INTO BITE SIZED EPISODES FOR A MAINSTREAM AUDIENCE THE SHOW IS KIND OF LIKE A CLIFF NOTES VERSION OF THE BOOKS HITTING THE SAME MAJOR STORY BEATS BUT NOT NECESSARILY TAKING THE SAME PATH TO GET THERE ALSO THERE ARE LITERALLY HUNDREDS OF CHARACTERS IN THE BOOKS AND DOZENS OF LITTLE SUBPLOTS THAT ARE NEVER REFERENCED IN THE SHOW THAT FILL IN A LOT OF THE STORY

SOME PEOPLE PREFER THE SHOW BECAUSE OF THE CINEMATIC TREATMENT AND SIMPLIFICATION OF THE STORY TO THE POINT WHERE YOU DON'T NEED TO TAKE NOTES OTHERS PREFER THE BOOKS AND THE IMMENSE AMOUNT OF DETAIL AND ENJOY HAVING THE FULL PICTURE OF WHAT'S GOING ON I THINK THEY BOTH HAVE THEIR MERITS AND I KNOW YOU SAID YOU DON'T WANT TO READ THEM BUT IF AFTER YOU WATCH THE SHOW YOU'RE STILL WANTING TO FIGURE OUT MORE OF WHAT'S GOING ON IN THE STORY YOU SHOULD TAKE A LOOK AT THE BOOKS
START FROM THE BEGINNING AND WATCH ALL SEASONS THIS WILL GET YOU UP TO SPEED ALSO THE SPECIAL LORE VIDEOS ON DVD YOUTUBE BLURRY ARE VERY GOOD IN EXPLAINING THINGS
GAME OF THRONES IS THE TYPE OF SHOW YOU CAN RECATCH OVER AND OVER AND GET SOMETHING NEW OUT OF IT EVERYTIME UNLIKE WALKING DEAD WHERE THERE IS SO MUCH FILLER IT'S HARD TO GET THROUGH ONE SITTING THAT'S WHAT MAKES THE SHOW SO GOOD

WHEN YOU RECATCH FOR THE SECOND TIME IT'S ALMOST LIKE WATCHING A DIFFERENT SHOW BECAUSE YOU KNOW ALL THE CHARACTERS AND CAN PICKUP ON A LOT MORE OF THE FORESHADOWING SMALLER DETAILS
START AT THE BEGINNING SO MUCH HAPPENS IN EVERY EPISODE AND EVERY SEASON YOU SHOULD JUST START WHERE IT STARTED AND WORK YOUR WAY FROM THERE

TO HELP YOU OUT A LITTLE I HAVE A STORY OF MY OWN I STARTED WITH THE SHOW AND ALMOST LOST INTEREST AROUND EPISODE BECAUSE I JUST WASN'T FOLLOWING EVERYTHING THAT WAS HAPPENING CHARACTER NAMES LOCATIONS ETC SO I PUT THE SERIES DOWN FOR LIKE A MONTH BEFORE DECIDING TO ACTUALLY TAKE THE PLUNGE AND CATCH UP BEFORE SEASON 2 STARTED

HERE IS WHAT I DID TO HELP MYSELF UNDERSTAND WHAT WAS GOING ON YOU WILL NEED A MAP AND A GENEALOGY GUIDE SO THAT IF YOU EVER HAVE TO QUESTION SOMETHING YOU HAVE A HANDY GUIDE RIGHT THERE I USED IT FOR ALMOST ALL OF SEASON AND BY THE END OF THAT SEASON I WAS ON DOING WELL ON MY OWN FINALLY

I HAD A SIMPLE IDEA A WHILE AGO THAT ALL OF THE DRAGONS WILL SUFFER A FATE SIMILAR TO THEIR NAMESAKE IN SHORT RHAEGAL LIKE RHAEGAR WILL DIE IN BATTLE WITH AN ENEMY VISERION WILL THREATEN ANY JUST AS MISERY'S DID FORCING DRAGON TO KILL HIM AND MOST TELLINGLY ANY WILL HAVE TO KILL DRAGON IN A BITTERSWEET TWIST THE MORE I MULLED IT OVER IT SEEMED TO FIT AND AT THE VERY LEAST IT IS FUN TO GUESS HOW THE FORESHADOWING WILL PLAY OUT


LOOKING BACK AT RHAEGAR HE HAD AN EPIC BATTLE WITH ROBERT IN THE RAGING RIVERS HE ULTIMATELY SUCCUMBED TO A WARHAMMER BLOW THAT CAUSED THE RUBIES TO FLY OFF HIS CHESTPLATE LIKE DROPS OF BLOOD LIKEWISE I BELIEVE RHAEGAL WILL TAKE A BLOW THAT WILL QUITE LITERALLY KNOCK THE SCALES OFF HIS CHEST HE MAY ALSO DROWN IN A DIRECT BATTLE WITH A KRAKEN OR ANOTHER DRAGON JUST AS RHAEGAR ENDED UP IN THE WATER ANOTHER POSSIBILITY IS DEATH BY A TRIDENT SPEAR SINCE WE STILL HAVE A CROSSBOW MAKING THE ROUNDS IN LANDING RHAEGAL IS ADMITTEDLY THE HARDEST ONE TO GUESS AS THE STORY IS STILL SO OPEN


NEXT UP ARE MISERY'S AND VISERION WHO HAD A LOT IN COMMON THEY BOTH SPENT THEIR EARLY YEARS BEGGING AND TRAVELLING WITH A SIBLING MISERY'S THREATS TO ANY EVENTUALLY ESCALATED UNTIL RAKHARO DEFENDED HER WITH A WHIP ANY DEFENDED HERSELF WITH A BELT OF BRONZE MEDALLIONS AND FINALLY THE DOTHRAKI HELD MISERY'S DOWN WHILE DRAGO GAVE HIM A BLOODLESS DEATH


I THINK THIS FORESHADOWS VISERION BEING TO THE POINT WHERE HE ATTACKS ANY EVEN THOUGH HE IS CREAM COLORED HE IS OFTEN REFERRED TO AS THE WHITE DRAGON SO IT SHOULDN'T BE A SURPRISE THE FIRST TIME HE ATTACKS ANY MIGHT USE HER BRONZE DOTHRAKI TO DEFEND HERSELF BUT DRAGON WILL EVENTUALLY NEED TO FINISH HIM ON THE SHOW THE BLOODRIDERS HOLD MISERY'S DOWN AND BREAK HIS ARM PERHAPS THE DOTHRAKI WILL BREAK ONE OF WINGS MAKING IT EASIER TO HOLD HIM SO DRAGON CAN GO IN FOR THE FINAL KILL ANOTHER POSSIBILITY IS THAT EFRON MAY USE THE HORN ON THE OPEN SEA AND VISERION COULD ATTACK ANY THERE VISERION MIGHT THEN BE WEIGHED DOWN SOMEHOW LIKE THE POT OF GOLD ON MISERY'S HEAD AND DROWNED IN A BLOODLESS DEATH


THE EASIEST COMPARISON THOUGH IS DRAGO AND DRAGON I BELIEVE STORY NOT ONLY FORESHADOWS DEATH IT REVEALS THAT ANY WILL BE THE WARRIOR THAT FORGES LIGHTBRINGER BY STABBING DRAGON IN THE CHEST


LOOKING AT DRAGO HE CAMPAIGNED FOR ANY TO THE POINT WHERE HE WAS INJURED RIGHT OVER HIS HEART HE COULD NO LONGER RIDE WAS NO LONGER HIMSELF AND ANY HIM LIKEWISE I BELIEVE DRAGON WILL BE INJURED IN BATTLE TO THE POINT WHERE HE CAN NO LONGER FLY A DRAGON NOT BEING ABLE TO FLY WOULD BE VERY SIMILAR TO A DOTHRAKI WHO CANNOT RIDE A HORSE ALTERNATIVELY DRAGON MAY ALSO NOT BE HIMSELF FROM BARGING EITHER WAY JUST LIKE MERCY KILLING ANY WILL HAVE TO KILL DRAGON WITH A SWORD TO THE HEART HE MIGHT EVEN BE SMARTER THAN WE EXPECT AND BARE HIS CHEST TO HER WILLINGLY LIKE NISSA NISSA IN THAT LEGEND LIGHTBRINGER STABS HIS LOVED ONE AND HER CRY LEFT A CRACK IN THE FACE OF THE MOON KILLING DRAGON WOULD CERTAINLY HURT ANY THE MOON OF LIFE


THE AZOR ADAI LEGEND SUPPORTS THIS IT STATES THAT A WARRIOR SHALL DRAW FROM THE FIRE A BURNING SWORD AND THAT SWORD SHALL BE LIGHTBRINGER THE RED SWORD OF HEROES ANY IS INCREASINGLY PORTRAYED AS THE CHIEF DOTHRAKI WARRIOR LAST SEASON DARIO EVEN GOES OUT OF HIS WAY TO CALL HER NOT A PRINCESS BUT A CONQUEROR REGARDING THE SWORD COMING OUT RED DRAGON IS THE ONLY DRAGON WITH THAT COLOR SMOULDERING RED PITS FOR EYES AS WELL AS RED HORNS SPINE AND FIRE FINALLY IF YOU WATCH CLOSELY ON THE SHOW RED SCALES LOOK MORE AND MORE LIKE AN INTERNAL FIRE THE ORIGINAL LIGHTBRINGER FAILED TO FORGE A SWORD WITH WATER AND A LION SO IT WOULD MAKE SENSE THAT THE GREATEST FORGE OF ALL IS A DRAGON


FOR THE RECORD I DON'T NECESSARILY THINK THAT ANY IS AZOR ADAI BECAUSE OF ALL THIS I THINK SHE WILL FORGE THE SWORD AND BE LIGHTBRINGER AND JON WILL BE AZOR ADAI AND WIELD IT IN A BATTLE WITH THE NIGHT KING I APPRECIATE THAT THIS IS ALL SPECULATION BUT IF THE FIRST DRAGON DEATH DOES END UP MIRRORING ITS NAMESAKE IT MEANS WE CAN LOOK TO THESE EARLIER CHARACTER DEATHS RHAEGAR MISERY'S AND DRAGO FOR IDEAS ON HOW THE DRAGONS STORIES AND THE MAIN STORY WILL END

SEASON

THE CRANNOGMEN ARE DISLIKED DISTRUSTED BY EVERYONE EVEN THE OTHER NORTHERNERS THINK THEY'RE A BIT OF AN ODD BUNCH THEY FIGHT USING NETS POISON AND GUERRILLA WARFARE TACTICS WHICH OTHERS THINK ARE COWARDLY AND OR IMPROPER WAYS OF FIGHTING THEY LIVE IN A SWAMP WHICH THEY ALMOST NEVER LEAVE THEY ARE BELIEVED BY MANY TO BE THE PRODUCT OF INTERBREEDING BETWEEN THE FIRST MEN AND THE CHILDREN OF THE FOREST WHICH MAKES PEOPLE SUSPICIOUS OF THEM THEIR NOBLE HOUSES ARE RELATIVELY POOR AND THEY HAVE NO CASTLES EXCEPT GREYWETHER WATCH WHICH ISN'T REALLY MUCH OF A CASTLE EITHER IT'S BASICALLY A BIG WOODEN HUT AND THERE ARE NO MASTERS THERE WHICH MEANS NO COMMUNICATION WITH THE REST OF THE WORLD ANOTHER THING PEOPLE FIND SUSPICIOUS NOR KNIGHTS NOR MEN-AT-ARMS THEY HAVE NO LEGENDARY FIGURES OR HEROES OTHER THAN THE KNIGHT OF THE LAUGHING TREE WHO IS SUSPECTED BY SOME TO MAYBE HAVE BEEN A CRANNOGMAN BUT HE WAS JUST A MYSTERY KNIGHT WHO FOUGHT IN TOURNEY AND IT'S VERY POSSIBLY THAT HE WASN'T A CRANNOGMAN AT ALL THEY EAT FROGS WHICH PEOPLE CONSIDER WEIRD THEY'RE SMALL IN STATURE AND LIVE RELATIVELY PRIMITIVE LIFESTYLES

THEY'RE GENERALLY LOOKED DOWN UPON BY THE REST OF THE SEVEN KINGDOMS EVEN THE REST OF THE NORTH THINKS THEY'RE A BIT WEIRD EXCEPT THE STARKS TO WHOM THEY ARE FIERCELY LOYAL DESPITE BEING VERY UNWILLING TO LEAVE THEIR SWAMPS FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN JOHEN AND BEERA COMING TO AID AND HOWLAND REED ACCOMPANYING NED TO THE TOWER OF JOY AND SAVING HIS LIFE THERE IS VERY LITTLE ACCOUNT OF CRANNOGMEN EVER LEAVING THE NECK
IT'S BECAUSE THEY'RE A COWARDLY LOT OF BOG DEVILS THAT RELY ON POISON AND SWAMP TRAPS TO PROTECT THEIR IMPOVERISHED INBRED FAMILIES FROM MORE SOPHISTICATED PEOPLE SUCH AS HOUSE FREY
EVERYONE IS LISTING PURELY CULTURAL REASONS FOR THIS BUT IT'S REALLY MORE SIMPLE THAN THAT THEY'RE NEIGHBORS AND AS SUCH HATE EACH OTHER DUE TO AGE OLD TERRITORIAL DISPUTES THE CRANNOGMEN CONTROL MUCH IF THE NECK AND AS A RESULT ALL TRAFFIC TRAVELING NORTH FROM THE TWINS THE FLEYS CONTROL THE TWINS AND ALL TRAFFIC MOVING SOUTH FROM THE NECK

BORDER DISPUTES AND THE USE OF UNCONVENTIONAL TACTICS ON THE PART OF THE CRANNOGMEN HAVE WORN DOWN RELATIONS BETWEEN THE FLEYS AND REEDS OVER THE CENTURIES RESULTING IN SERIOUS BAD BLOOD

THE FRENCH ARE ALSO TAUNTED FOR EATING FROGS NOT BECAUSE OF THE ACT ITSELF BUT BECAUSE OF THE BITTER RIVALRY BETWEEN THEM AND ENGLAND THAT CEMENTED THE US AND THEM MENTALITY

THEY CONTROL AN IMPORTANT AREA THAT EVERYONE ELSE WANTS
I JUST STARTED READING THE BOOKS AS WELL AND ITS VERY INTERESTING TO GET MORE BACKGROUND ON JOHEN AND BEERA

IT IS DEFINITELY JUST BECAUSE THEY ARE DIFFERENT THAT THE CRANNOGMEN ARE DISLIKED IN HISTORY MANY PEOPLES WHO LIVED IN MOUNTAINOUS OR REMOTE REGIONS WOULD BE LOOKED DOWN UPON BECAUSE OF THEIR DIFFERENT CULTURE

A RECURRING INSULT THE FREY BOYS CALLED THEM WAS FROG EATERS PARALLELS CAN BE SEEN FROM REAL LIFE WHERE INUIT PEOPLE WERE SEEN AS SAVAGES BY MORE CIVILISED PEOPLE WHO LIVED CLOSE TO THEM BECAUSE THEY ATE RAW MEAT

ANOTHER INTERESTING POINT IS THEY ARE MOST RESPECTED BY THE NORTH WHO THEMSELVES ARE SEEN AS BACKWARDS BY THE LIKES OF THE BANNISTERS AND OTHER SOUTHERNERS

THEY'RE A POOR AND RECLUSIVE PEOPLE WHO ARE CONSIDERING TO HAVE A RATHER PRIMITIVE WAY OF LIFE IN ADDITION TO FIGHTING WITH COWARDLY HIT-AND-RUN TACTICS AND POISON
