THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE DOGMA OF THE FAITH IT IS VERY SIMILAR TO THE BASELINE TEACHINGS OF JESUS OF NAZARETH THE PROBLEM WITH THE FAITH IS THAT IT IS ORGANIZED RELIGION WITH A HIERARCHAL STRUCTURE AND ITS OWN POLICE FORCE AND MILITARY THIS ALLOWS IT TO COMPEL ACCEPTANCE AND CONFORMITY RATHER THAN TO APPEAL AND PERSUADE FOR IT APPEAL AND PERSUASION ARE HARD USING VIOLENCE TO MAKE PEOPLE ACCEPT AND CONFORM IS EASY SO THE FAITH GOES TO VIOLENCE AS A FIRST OPTION TRANSGRESSING ITS OWN TEACHINGS THE HIERARCHY BECOMES CLOSED AND NEPOTISTIC AND HEREDITARY AND BEGINS TO LOOK TO ITS OWN POWER AND COMFORT RATHER THAN THE NEEDS OF THE PEOPLE THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE GUIDING AND HELPING THE ORGANIZATION ALLOWS FANATICS TO RISE TO POWER AND USE THAT POWER TO THEIR OWN ENDS AS THE HIGH SPARROW WAS DOING HIS ENDS MAY HAVE BEEN SANCTIFIED BUT HIS MEANS WERE SINFUL AND WRONG THE FAITH IS ALSO MILITANT IN ITS MISSIONARY WORK WHEN THE ANDALE INVADED ESTEROS IT WAS PARTLY A JIHAD WITH THE ANDALE IMPOSING THE FAITH OF THE SEVEN WHERE EVER THEY CONQUERED ADD TO THIS THE ATTEMPT TO INFILTRATE AND CONTROL THE SECULAR GOVERNMENT AND ITS POWER TO ITS OWN PURPOSES

THIS IS A PURE ANALOGY FOR THE PLACE AND HISTORY OF ORGANIZED RELIGION IN THE WESTERN WORLD WHILE THE FAITH MOSTLY MIRRORS THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH WITH ITS HIERARCHY DOGMA MILITANCY BENEDICTINES AND CISTERCIAN THE INQUISITION MILITANT ORDERS TEMPLARS HISPITALERS AND PREDILECTION FOR INFILTRATING ALLYING WITH AND DOMINATING GOVERNMENTS SUCH AS ITS RELATIONSHIP WITH THE MONARCHIES OF FRANCE AND SPAIN OR THE AUSTRO-HUNGARIAN EMPIRE THE PAPAL STATES OR EVEN THE IRISH REPUBLIC THE CHURCH RUNS THE GOVERNMENT'S EDUCATION SYSTEM

IT IS ALSO AN ANALOGY FOR WHAT HAPPENS WHEN THE BOUNDARIES BETWEEN CHURCH AND STATE BLUR OR DISAPPEAR

GAME OF THRONES FILMING LOCATIONS YOU CAN VISIT

HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT OF TAKING A TRIP TO WHERE YOUR FAVORITE BLOCKBUSTER MOVIE TV DRAMA OR SERIES WAS FILMED FOR MOST PEOPLE THIS LOOKS LIKE A FAR-FETCHED IDEA BUT THAT IS NOT THE CASE WHEN IT COMES TO GAME OF THRONES THE GAME OF THRONES IS BY FAR ONE OF THE MOST ENTHRALLING AMERICAN FANTASIES DRAMA WELL KNOWN FOR ITS GORY DEATH SCENES GAME OF THRONES IS BASED ON THE BOOK BY GEORGE ROYAL R MARTIN IT IS WELL KNOWN FOR ITS BLOODBATH VIOLENT AND SOME OF THE BEST SCENES HOWEVER ONE THING THAT WILL STRIKE YOU OUT IS THE SETTING OF THE LANDS OF FIRE ICE MUCH MORE THEY ARE A LOT MORE TRANQUIL AND PEACEFUL MAKING LOVERS OF THE DRAMA WANT TO VISIT THERE BELOW YOU WILL FIND GAME OF THRONES FILMING LOCATIONS

THE MODERN BANNISTERS ARE DESCENDED FROM A BANNISTER WOMAN WHOSE HUSBAND TOOK HER NAME THE MORMON AND TOKENWORTH NAMES ARE CURRENTLY GOING THROUGH WOMEN THE STARK NAME IS FINE
WELL THEY PRONOUNCING HIM KINGINDANORF SO I'D GUESS HE COULD LEGITIMIZE HIMSELF
IF WE USE EUROPEAN NOBLE HOUSES AS A MODEL OF HOW ESTEROS WORKS THERE'S A TRADITION OF NOBLE HOUSES PRESERVING THEIR LINE BY EITHER ADOPTING MALE HEIRS WHICH MIGHT EASILY HAPPEN WITH JON HERE AS BASICALLY HAPPENED WHEN ELIZABETH I WAS SUCCEEDED BY JAMES I OR BY A FEMALE HEIR KEEPING HER MAIDEN NAME WHEN SHE MARRIES AND PERHAPS HER HUSBAND TAKING HER NAME AS COULD HAPPEN WITH ANSA AS HAPPENED WITH THE CURRENT BRITISH ROYAL FAMILY
LAST NAME CAN CONTINUE FROM THE MATERNAL LINE JON COULD ALSO BE LEGITIMIZED AS A STARK AND CONTINUE THE NAME THERE'S REALLY NO CAUSE FOR CONCERN SINCE THERE'S THREE AVAILABLE CANDIDATES THAT CAN PRODUCE HEIRS

MOST PEOPLE CAN STILL GET AN ERECTION IF THEY'RE PARALYZED FROM WAIST DOWN DIFFERENT NERVES AND SUCH YOU JUST MIGHT NOT BE ABLE TO FEEL ANYTHING DDK ABOUT EVERYTHING ELSE
BRAN CAN STILL GET IT UP IT'S A DIFFERENT SYSTEM ALL TOGETHER

SOME AMAZING EPISODES BLACKWATER KISSED BY FIRE THE RAINS OF CASTAMERE THE LION AND THE ROSE THE MOUNTAIN AND THE VIPER THE CHILDREN HARDHOME HOME BOOK OF THE STRANGERS THE DOOR BATTLE OF THE BASTARDS THE WINDS OF WINTER

HOW BRAVOS ARC ENDED


I WAS A TEENY BIT DISAPPOINTED THAT NED STARK WASN'T AS NARKY AS HE WAS IN THE BOOKS ONE OF MY FAVOURITE SCENES IN THE BOOKS WAS WHEN NED SASSED PUCELLE WHEN HE WAS INJURED AND THAT WAS GREAT HOWEVER SEAN BEAN DID A VERY GOOD JOB IN PORTRAYING NED STARK IMO

I ALSO AGREE THAT ARYA BEING CUPBEARER WAS REALLY INTERESTING
STILL WAITING ON THIS VICTARION GUY TO SHOW UP
APPARENTLY IN THE BOOKS JON CONNINGTON IS STILL ALIVE BUT CONTRACTED GREYSCALE THE SAME WAY THAT BORAH CONTRACTED IT THEIR CHARACTERS WERE MORPHED THIS WAY AND THAT HE'S BEEN SECRETLY RAISING THE MAD SON AEGON AS HIS OWN THE MOUNTAIN HAD APPARENTLY KILLED BABY AEGON SO BARBARICALLY THAT THE BODY WAS UNRECOGNIZABLE MEANING THAT IT'S FULLY POSSIBLE THAT AEGON ACTUALLY ESCAPED INTO HIDING AS A BABY THE SAME WAY DAENARYS AND MISERY'S DID AND IT'S BEEN RUMORED THAT CASTING CALLS HAVE GONE OUT FOR AN ACTOR WITH CHARACTERISTICS

NED WAS NAMED REGENT NOT KING ROBERT WANTED NED TO RULE AND GUIDE JOFFREY WHO WOULD STILL BE KING BUT WOULDN'T HAVE FULL POWERS UNTIL JOFFREY CAME OF AGE AFTER WHICH HE WOULD BECOME THE KING AND NED WOULD PRESUMABLY STEP DOWN

NED KNEW JOFFREY WAS ILLEGITIMATE BUT HE DIDN'T WANT TO LAY THAT SHIT ON HIS DYING BEST FRIEND SO HE KEPT QUIET ABOUT IT WHAT HE DID INSTEAD WAS CHANGE WILL FROM SAYING NED SHOULD BE REGENT UNTIL MY SON JOFFREY COMES OF AGE TO MY RIGHTFUL HEIR WHICH IN THIS CASE MEANS STANNIC

STANNIC IS ALREADY OF AGE SO NED WOULDN'T ACTUALLY BE REGENT BY THE AMENDED WILLIAM STANNIC WOULD BE KING IMMEDIATELY
HE NAMED HIM LORD PROTECTOR WHICH IS A BASICALLY A REGENT TO RULE IN HIS HEIRS PLACE UNTIL HE COMES OF AGE AND NO HE NEVER WANTED TO BE KING
ITS CLEARER IN THE BOOK NED REALIZES THAT JOFFREY AND TOLMEN ARE ILLEGITIMATE BUT DECIDES NOT TO BURDEN ROBERT WITH THAT FACT IN HIS FINAL MOMENTS THE BOOK DESCRIBES HOW HE TRANSCRIBES UNTIL MY SON JOFFREY COMES OF AGE AS UNTIL MY HEIR COMES OF AGE IN THE LETTER HE THEN SIGNS AND SEALS ON HIS DEATHBED AND CERASEIN LATER RIPS UP WHILE LAUGHING ABOUT IT I BELIEVE THESE DETAILS ARE ALL IN THE SHOW AS WELL BUT NOT AS CLEARLY SPELLED OUT

GOT AND WESTWORLD CROSSOVER SAY IT ISN'T SO FINGERS CROSSED
A CERTAIN CROSSOVER THAT IS IN THE AIR
MARTIN HAS SAID THE DOTHRAKI ARE LOOSELY BASED ON THE MONGOLS AND HUNS WITH CULTURAL HABITS BORROWED FROM OTHER HORSE WARRIOR CULTURES LIKE THE COMANCHE THEY DON'T WEAR OR UNDERSTAND MUCH ABOUT ARMOR SO THEIR MILITARY TACTICS ARE A BIT DIFFERENT FROM THE MONGOLS BUT THEIR NUMBERS ARE SIMILAR MONGOLS WOULD RIDE TO WAR IN VAST UNITS CALLED THE ROUMAN WHICH INCLUDED ROUGHLY RIDERS PLUS SERVANTS SLAVES BAGGAGE ARIAN ETC THAT MEANS DOTHRAKI TOO MUST HAVE SOME LARGE-SCALE COMMAND AND CONTROL LIKE THE MONGOLS HAD

MONGOLS HAVE A FUNNY REPUTATION IN EUROPE A REPUTATION ESSENTIALLY BASED ON MEDIEVAL PROPAGANDA I SAY MONGOL YOU SAY HORDE YOU PICTURE A BAND OF WILD SAVAGES ROVING THE LAND MURDERING AND DEVOURING EVERYTHING IN THEIR PATH LIKE LOCUSTS

BUT IN FACT MONGOLS WERE AMONG THE FINEST MILITARY STRATEGISTS AND TACTICIANS OF THEIR ERA OR ANY ERA THEY WERE MASTERS OF CAVALRY TACTICS AND WERE ABLE TO COORDINATE THOUSANDS OF RIDERS BROKEN INTO AD HOC FIGHTING GROUPS IN THE MIDST OF BATTLE THIS MEANT THAT THEIR GENERALS COULD ADAPT STRATEGIES ON THE FLY TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF SITUATIONS ON THE GROUND READ ABOUT GENGHIS GENERAL AND MASTER STRATEGIST SHUBUTA

HE DIRECTED MORE THAN TWENTY CAMPAIGNS IN WHICH HE CONQUERED THIRTY-TWO NATIONS AND WON SIXTY-FIVE PITCHED BATTLES DURING WHICH HE CONQUERED OR OVERRAN MORE TERRITORY THAN ANY OTHER COMMANDER IN HISTORY HE GAINED VICTORY BY MEANS OF IMAGINATIVE AND SOPHISTICATED STRATEGIES AND ROUTINELY COORDINATED MOVEMENTS OF ARMIES THAT WERE HUNDREDS OF KILOMETERS AWAY FROM EACH OTHER HE IS ALSO REMEMBERED FOR DEVISING THE CAMPAIGN THAT DESTROYED THE ARMIES OF HUNGARY AND POLAND WITHIN TWO DAYS OF EACH OTHER BY FORCES OVER FIVE HUNDRED KILOMETERS APART

HAVING DEVASTATED THE VARIOUS RUSSIAN PRINCIPALITIES HE SENT SPIES AS FAR AS POLAND HUNGARY AND AUSTRIA IN PREPARATION FOR AN ATTACK INTO THE HEARTLAND OF EUROPE HAVING A CLEAR PICTURE OF THE EUROPEAN KINGDOMS HE BRILLIANTLY PREPARED AN ATTACK NOMINALLY COMMANDED BY BTU KHAN AND TWO OTHER PRINCES OF THE BLOOD WHILE BTU KHAN SON OF JOCH WAS THE OVERALL LEADER SHUBUTA WAS THE ACTUAL COMMANDER IN THE FIELD AND AS SUCH WAS PRESENT IN BOTH THE NORTHERN AND SOUTHERN CAMPAIGNS AGAINST KIEVAN RUS HE ALSO COMMANDED THE CENTRAL COLUMN THAT MOVED AGAINST THE KINGDOM OF HUNGARY WHILE NORTHERN FORCE WON THE BATTLE OF LEGNICA AND ARMY TRIUMPHED IN TRANSYLVANIA SHUBUTA WAS WAITING FOR THEM ON THE HUNGARIAN PLAIN

KING BALA IV OF HUNGARY HAD SUMMONED A COUNCIL OF WAR AT ESZTERGOM A LARGE AND IMPORTANT SETTLEMENT UPRIVER FROM BUDA AND PEST AS BTU WAS ADVANCING ON HUNGARY FROM THE NORTHEAST THE HUNGARIAN LEADERSHIP DECIDED TO CONCENTRATE THEIR STRENGTH AT PEST AND THEN HEAD NORTH TO CONFRONT THE MONGOL ARMY WHEN NEWS OF THE HUNGARIAN BATTLE STRATEGY REACHED THE MONGOL COMMANDERS THEY SLOWLY WITHDREW TO THE AJO RIVER DRAWING THEIR ENEMIES ON THIS WAS A CLASSIC MONGOL STRATEGY ULTIMATELY PERFECTED BY SHUBUTA HE PREPARED A BATTLEFIELD SUITABLE TO HIS TACTICS AND WAITED FOR HIS ENEMIES TO BLUNDER IN IT WAS A STRONG POSITION BECAUSE WOODS PREVENTED THEIR RANKS FROM BEING CLEARLY SCOUTED OR SEEN WHILE ACROSS THE RIVER ON THE PLAIN OF BOHI THE HUNGARIAN ARMY WAS WIDELY EXPOSED

ONLY ONE DAY AFTER THE SMALLER MONGOL ARMY IN POLAND HAD WON THE BATTLE OF LEGNICA SHUBUTA LAUNCHED HIS ATTACK THUS BEGINNING THE BATTLE OF BOHI DURING THE NIGHT OF APRIL AT BOHI A SINGLE DIVISION CROSSED THE RIVER IN SECRET TO ADVANCE ON THE HUNGARIAN CAMP FROM THE SOUTHERN FLANK THE MAIN BODY BEGAN TO CROSS THE AJO BY THE BRIDGE AT BOHI AND CONTINUED TO ATTACK THE FOLLOWING DAY THIS WAS MET WITH FIERCE RESISTANCE SO CATAPULTS WERE USED TO CLEAR THE OPPOSITE BANK OF CROSSBOWMEN AS WAS NOTED EARLIER WHEN THE CROSSING WAS COMPLETED THE SECOND CONTINGENT ATTACKED FROM THE SOUTHERN

THE RESULT WAS COMPLETE PANIC AND TO ENSURE THAT THE HUNGARIANS DID NOT FIGHT TO THE LAST MAN THE MONGOLS LEFT AN OBVIOUS GAP IN THEIR ENCIRCLEMENT THIS WAS ONE OF CLASSIC TRICKS TO CREATE A TACTICAL SITUATION WHICH APPEARED TO BE FAVOURABLE TO THE ENEMY BUT WHICH WAS ANYTHING BUT THE MONGOLS HAD ALREADY INCURRED HEAVIER THAN USUAL CASUALTIES AS THE HUNGARIAN CROSSBOWMEN HAD DONE CONSIDERABLE DAMAGE TO THE MONGOL CAVALRY SHUBUTA DID NOT WANT A BATTLE WHERE THE MASSED CROSSBOWMEN SUPPORTED BY MOUNTED KNIGHTS STOOD FIRM AND FOUGHT TO THE DEATH AGAINST HIS ARMY HE FAR PREFERRED TO LET THEM FLEE AND BE SLAUGHTERED INDIVIDUALLY THE GAP IN THE MONGOL LINES WAS AN INVITATION TO RETREAT WHICH WOULD LEAVE THE KNIGHTS AND CROSSBOWMEN SPREAD OUT ALL OVER THE COUNTRYSIDE EASY PICKINGS FOR THE DISCIPLINED MONGOLS AS SHUBUTA HAD PLANNED THE HUNGARIANS POURED THROUGH THIS APPARENT HOLE IN THE MONGOL LINES WHICH LED TO A SWAMPY AREA POOR FOOTING FOR HORSES AND HARD GOING FOR INFANTRY WHEN THE HUNGARIAN KNIGHTS SPLIT UP THE MONGOL ARCHERS PICKED THEM OFF AT WILLIAM IT WAS LATER NOTED THAT CORPSES LITTERED THE COUNTRYSIDE OVER THE SPACE OF A TWO-DAY JOURNEY TWO ARCHBISHOPS AND THREE BISHOPS WERE KILLED AT THE AJO PLUS FIGHTING MEN AT ONE STROKE THE BULK OF HUNGARIAN FIGHTING MEN WERE TOTALLY DESTROYED WITH RELATIVELY MINIMAL CASUALTIES TO THE MONGOLS REPORTEDLY LESS THAN MEN

NOTE THE EXTENSIVE USE OF SPIES SCOUTS AND ADVANCE COMMUNICATION SHUBUTA WAS FIGHTING IN UNFAMILIAR TERRITORY YET HE KNEW THE TERRAIN THE POLITICAL DIVISIONS THE STRENGTH AND LOCATIONS AND FIGHTING ABILITY AND PSYCHOLOGICAL STATE OF HIS ENEMY COMMANDERS AS WELL AS ENEMY SOLDIERS AND HE TOOK STEPS TO CONCEAL THAT SAME INFORMATION ABOUT HIS OWN FORCES THIS WASN'T A RAVENING HORDE OF SAVAGES THIS WAS EUROPE BEING INVADED BY AN ENEMY THAT WAS MORE SOPHISTICATED IN JUST ABOUT EVERY WAY EXCEPT FOR THE PART ABOUT BEING BENT ON MURDER CONQUEST AND ENSLAVEMENT

NOR WERE MONGOLS LIMITED TO FIGHTING IN OPEN FIELDS THEY ALSO BECAME ADEPT AT CITY BREAKING IN THEIR LONG SWEEP ACROSS THE STEPPE THEY BROUGHT CHINESE AND PERSIAN ENGINEERS WITH THEM TO BREACH WALLS AND OVERCOME DEFENSES THEY ALSO UNDERSTOOD DIPLOMACY AND GOVERNANCE LEARNED EARLY ON AS GENGHIS UNIFIED THE VARIOUS MONGOL CLANS FOR OVER A CENTURY THERE WERE MONGOL RULERS OF CHINA INDIA PERSIA TURKEY RUSSIA ETC

INDIVIDUAL MONGOL WARRIORS BEGAN LEARNING TO RIDE AND SHOOT FROM HORSEBACK FROM THE AGE OF THEY USED COMPOSITE SHORTBOWS WITH A DRAW WEIGHT OF ROUGHLY LB MODERN DAY PROFESSIONAL ARCHERS RARELY USE ANYTHING GREATER THAN LB THE POWERFUL BOWS GAVE THEM TREMENDOUS RANGE ACCURACY AND QUICKNESS POINT BEING THEY HAD A HIGH LEVEL OF SKILL AND COMBAT DISCIPLINE TO CARRY OUT COMPLEX STRATEGIES IT WASN'T UNTIL WWII THAT WESTERN ARMIES CAME AROUND TO FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE MONGOLS STRATEGIC USE OF HIGHLY MOBILE COORDINATED FIREPOWER

THE WESTERMOST KNIGHTS AREN'T NEARLY AS NAIVE AS CENTURY MEDIEVAL EUROPEANS THEY HAVE A MORE SOPHISTICATED GRASP OF STRATEGY AND DISCIPLINED ARMIES TO CARRY OUT STRATEGY ONE THING MAKES THEM VERY SIMILAR TO EUROPE IN THE CENTURY THOUGH FRAGMENTATION AFTER YEARS OF FIGHTING ONE ANOTHER IN A CIVIL WAR ESTEROS IS GOING TO BE UNABLE TO UNIFY ITS ARMIES OR RALLY ITS LEADERSHIP AROUND A SINGLE STRATEGIC GOAL A SKILLED LEADER COMMANDING A SINGLE UNIFIED ARMY WHICH DAENARYS IS LEARNING TO BECOME WOULD BE ABLE TO EXPLOIT THOSE DIVISIONS TURN ENEMIES AGAINST ONE ANOTHER USE ONE ARMY'S MISTRUST OF ANOTHER TO ANNIHILATE BOTH ETC

ONE PROBLEM THE DOTHRAKI SEEM TO RARELY USE ARCHERS YOU ALMOST HARDLY SEE THEM CARRYING A BOW THAT I CAN RECALL AT LEAST INSTEAD THEY CARRY CURVED SCIMITARS LIKE OTTOMAN TURKS IT MAKES THEM THE EQUIVALENT OF SHOCK CAVALRY RATHER THAN RANGE CAVALRY THIS IS STUPID BECAUSE IT GIVES AWAY ONE OF THE GREAT STRATEGIC ASSETS OF A CAVALRY ARMY HIGHLY MOBILE FIREPOWER SWORDS ARE INDEED BADASS BUT BOWS WIN WARS
IT COMPARES TO REAL HISTORY THEY HAVE BEEN EXAGGERATED BY PEOPLE IN ESTEROS BUT STILL ITS RIDERS AND AS SAID THEIR BATTLE TACTICS ARE TOTALLY UNKNOWN AND DIFFERENT BUT THEY WONT HELP ANY MUCH IN THE SIEGE OF KINGS LANDING WITH A OPEN FIELD THEY CAN JUST MOW DOWN AN ARMY LIKE WHEN THE RIDERS OF ROHAN WHEN THEY MOWED DOWN THE ORCS AT MINAS TIGRISH
THE MAIN ADVANTAGE OF THE DOTHRAKI WOULD BE SUPERIOR MOBILITY THEY'RE ALL CAVALRY IF THEY'RE LED BY A COMPETENT GENERAL THEY WILL ONLY EVER HIT THE ENEMY ARMY'S WEAK SPOTS INCLUDING THEIR SUPPLIES

ARMOR AND SKILL AT HANDLING A SWORD WON'T HELP YOUR HEAVY INFANTRY THAT MUCH AFTER THEY HAVEN'T EATEN ANYTHING FOR A WEEK
FROM THE FIRST BOOK WHEN ANY ASKS BORAH ABOUT HOW GOOD THE DOTHRAKI ARE

NOW THE KNIGHT SAID I AM LESS CERTAIN THEY ARE BETTER RIDERS THAN ANY KNIGHT UTTERLY FEARLESS AND THEIR BOWS OUTRANGE OURS IN THE SEVEN KINGDOMS MOST ARCHERS FIGHT ON FOOT FROM BEHIND A SHIELDWALL OR A BARRICADE OF SHARPENED STAKES THE DOTHRAKI FIRE FROM HORSEBACK CHARGING OR RETREATING IT MAKES NO MATTER THEY ARE FULL AS DEADLY AND THERE ARE SO MANY OF THEM MY LADY YOUR LORD HUSBAND ALONE COUNTS FORTY THOUSAND MOUNTED WARRIORS IN HIS KHALASAR

NOT LONG SHE SAID NOT WELL

HE NODDED MIND YOU PRINCESS IF THE LORDS OF THE SEVEN KINGDOMS HAVE THE WIT THE GODS GAVE A GOOSE IT WILL NEVER COME TO THAT THE RIDERS HAVE NO TASTE FOR SIEGECRAFT I DOUBT THEY COULD TAKE EVEN THE WEAKEST CASTLE IN THE SEVEN KINGDOMS BUT IF ROBERT BARATHRON WERE FOOL ENOUGH TO GIVE THEM BATTLE

YOU GET THE PICTURE THE DOTHRAKI MAY NOT BE A GOOD ARMY IN THE TRADITIONAL SENSE BUT THEY HAVE HUGE NUMBERS AND ARE GREAT AT CREATING HAVOC
I'VE THOUGHT ABOUT THIS QUESTION BEFORE IMHO THEIR COMBAT PROWESS HAS BEEN EXAGGERATED THE BEST THING FROM THE REAL WORLD I CAN COMPARE THEM TOO ARE THE NUMIDIAN CAVALRY OF AROUND B COUNTY THE NUMIDIAN WERE CONSIDERED THE BEST HORSEMAN AROUND AND THEY OPERATED BY LIGHTNING ATTACKS WITH CURVED BLADES AND FAST HORSES

IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT WHEN THERE WAS A LARGE OPEN FIELD TO MOUNT A CHARGE THERE WAS ALMOST NO STOPPING THEM THEY WOULD SWOOP IN HACK THE ENEMY TO PIECES AND THEN RIDE OFFICIAL THEIR PROBLEMS CAME WHEN THEY HAD TO FIGHT HAND TO HAND FOR A PROLONGED PERIOD OF TIME THEIR LIGHT ARMOR AND LIGHT WEAPONRY WEREN'T SUITED TO CLOSE QUARTERS FIGHTING

I THINK THE DOTHRAKI ARE THE SAME IN AN OPEN FIELD THEY CAN DECIMATE ENTIRE ARMIES BUT WHEN YOU GET UP CLOSE TO THEM THEIR OBVIOUS FLAWS RESULT IN WHAT HAPPENED TO THE FOOL WHO CHALLENGED BORAH
THE REASON THE HORDES WERE SO SUCCESSFUL IN REAL LIFE IS BECAUSE THE EUROPEAN ARMIES WEREN'T THAT FAMILIAR WITH THEIR BATTLE TACTICS SOMETHING SIMILAR WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN HERE
BORAH IS FAR FROM A WEAK OLD MAN

HE IS ABOUT HE'S ON THE DOWNWARD SLOPE FROM HIS PRIME BUT CONSIDERING HE HAS BEEN FIGHTING ALMOST FOR ABOUT YEARS HE IS PROBABLY IN INCREDIBLY GOOD SHAPE COMPARED TO SOMEONE LIKE NED

NED HADN'T FOUGHT IN YEARS AND WAS STILL ABLE TO HOLD OFF JAIME BANNISTER UNTIL SOMEONE INTERVENED
SOMETIMES A CHEVACHEE IS JUST WHAT IS NEEDED TO DRAW THE ENEMY OUT OF THEIR CASTLES THIS IS WHERE THE DOTHRAKI WILL BE IMPORTANT

A CHEVAUCHÉE FRENCH PRONUNCIATION ƩƏVOƩE PROMENADE OR HORSE CHARGE DEPENDING ON CONTEXT WAS A RAIDING METHOD OF MEDIEVAL WARFARE FOR WEAKENING THE ENEMY PRIMARILY BY BURNING AND PILLAGING ENEMY TERRITORY IN ORDER TO REDUCE THE PRODUCTIVITY OF A REGION AS OPPOSED TO SIEGE WARFARE OR WARS OF CONQUEST THE CHEVAUCHÉE COULD BE USED AS A WAY OF FORCING AN ENEMY TO FIGHT OR AS A MEANS OF DISCREDITING THE ENEMY'S GOVERNMENT AND DETACHING HIS SUBJECTS FROM THEIR LOYALTY THIS USUALLY CAUSED A MASSIVE FLIGHT OF REFUGEES TO FORTIFIED TOWNS AND CASTLES WHICH WOULD BE UNTOUCHED BY THE CHEVAUCHÉE THE USE OF THE CHEVAUCHÉE DECLINED AT THE END OF THE CENTURY AS THE FOCUS OF WARFARE TURNED TO SIEGES
THE DOTHRAKI ARE NOT BASED ON HISTORICAL EXAMPLES EVERY NOMADIC PEOPLE USING HORSES I CAN IMMEDIATELY THINK OF USED THE BOW AS HORSE ARCHERS SCYTHIAN SARMATIAN PARTHIAN IRANIANS SASSANID PERSIANS TURKOMEN TARTARS MONGOLS MANCHUS EVEN THE NATIVE AMERICAN PLAINS TRIBES ONCE THEY ADOPTED THE HORSE ALL USED THE BOW IN COMBINATION WITH THE LANCE WHILE THE MAJORITY WERE HORSE ARCHERS WITH LITTLE ARMOR THERE WAS ALWAYS A HARD CORE OF HEAVY ARMORED CAVALRY USING THE SPEAR THOSE THAT DID NOT USE THE BOW USED JAVELINS AND OTHER MISSILE WEAPONS TO HUNT AND TO FIGHT THE SWORD WAS USED TO COMPLETE MOUNTED COMBAT NOT INITIATE IT SUCH HORSE NOMADS OFTEN EXHIBITED SOPHISTICATED ORGANIZATION AND TACTICS DERIVED FROM BOTH INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL EXAMPLES AND EXPERIENCES THE PRIMARY TACTICS WAS TO SURROUND OR MANEUVER AROUND AN ENEMY SHOOTING THEIR BOWS AT THE APPROPRIATE RANGES UNTIL THE ENEMY'S FORMATIONS AND MORAL BEGAN TO ERODE AND THEN HAVE THE HEAVY ELEMENT CHARGE IN TO BREAK UP THE ENEMY AND ALLOW THE HORSE ARCHERS TO CLOSE WITH THE SWORD ONCE THE ENEMY WAS BROKEN THE HORSE ARCHERS WOULD PURSUE AND DESTROY THESE TACTICS WERE EXHIBITED AT BOTH CARRIAGE AND LIEGNITZ A WELL-DISCIPLINED TRAINED ENEMY OF HIGH MORALE HOWEVER WITH AN APPROPRIATE BALANCED FORCE OF SHOCK AND MISSILE TROOPS CAVALRY AND INFANTRY COULD DEFEAT THE HORSE NOMADS IF THEIR WAS A VULNERABILITY IT WAS THE NEED TO FEED THEIR HORSES GRASS FOR GRAZING WAS NEEDED BURNING THE FIELDS CUTTING THE GRAZING AREAS SHORT PLOWING THEM UNDER ALL DENIED THE NOMADS THE ABILITY TO FEED THEIR HORSES A SCORCHED EARTH STRATEGY COMBINED WITH RETIRING INTO FORTIFIED CITIES AND DEFENSIVE POSITIONS COULD FORCE NOMADIC INVADERS TO WITHDRAW BACK TO THEIR HOMELANDS

2 THE DOTHRAKI EXHIBIT LITTLE TACTICAL SKILL OR DISCIPLINE BEYOND LOYALTY AND HORSEMANSHIP TACTICALLY AGAINST SPEAR ARMED DISCIPLINED AND FORMED INFANTRY OR CAVALRY LIKE THE UNSULLIED OR THE BANNISTER PROFESSIONAL TROOPS THEY WOULD BE USELESS ON THE BATTLEFIELD HORSES ARE NOT STUPID THEY WILL NEITHER WILLING COLLIDE WITH EACH OTHER OR RUN ON TO POINTY THINGS AGAINST UNDERTRAINED AND UNDERDISCIPLINED FEUDAL LEVIES THEY COULD BE DEVASTATING SUCH INFANTRY WOULD EITHER BREAK AND RUN WHEN THE DOTHRAKI CHARGED OR THEY MIGHT BE ENTICED INTO BREAKING THEIR SHIELD WALL IN PURSUIT OF A ROUTING ENEMY LIKE THE ANGLO-SAXON FYRD AT HASTINGS AGAINST UNDISCIPLINED IE FEUDAL LIGHT CAVALRY WITH SIMILAR SKILLS VICTORY WOULD GO TO THE FORCE WITH GREATER MORALE AND NUMBERS AGAINST UNDISCIPLINED FEUDAL HEAVY CAVALRY THE DOTHRAKI WOULD TEMPT THEM INTO CHARGES AND CHASES CUTTING OFF SMALL PARTIES AND OVERWHELMING THEM UNTIL THE HORSES WERE TOO TIRED TO TROT MUCH LESS CHARGE AND THEN CLOSE IN FOR THE KILL THE DISCIPLINE OF THE KNIGHTS OF THE VALE WOULD DETERMINE WHETHER THEY WIN OR LOSE AGAINST THE DOTHRAKI THE DOTHRAKI WOULD HAVE DIFFICULTY WITH AN ENEMY THAT USED FIELD FORTIFICATIONS WHICH WOULD FORCE THEM TO DISMOUNT AND FIGHT AS INDIVIDUAL WARRIORS AGAINST DEFENDERS FIGHTING AS A COLLECTIVE THEY WOULD ALSO HAVE A PROBLEM WITH AN ARMY USING THE TACTICS OF THE CENTURY CE ENGLISH WHERE THEY WOULD BE DROWNED IN CLOUDS OF ARROWS BEFORE THEY COULD EVEN CLOSE WITH AN ENEMY IN CLOSE FORMATION ARMORED AND USING SPEARS AND WHAT THE DOTHRAKI WOULD BE GOOD AT IS RAIDING RAIDS INTO THE ENEMY'S REAR DISRUPTING HIS FORAGERS HIS SUPPLY TRAINS HIS CAMP FOLLOWERS WOULD DENY YOUR OPPONENT FOOD AND FODDER WHILE FORCING YOU TO DISPERSE YOUR MOBILE FORCES TO PROTECT YOUR SUPPLY BASES LINES AND AREAS RAIDS ON VILLAGES COLLECTING FOOD AND FODDER AND DRIVING THE VILLAGERS TOWARDS LANDING TO FILL IT WITH REFUGEES THAT DRAIN THE CITY'S RESOURCES

THE DOTHRAKI AND THEIR HORSES ARE NOT USED TO THE COLD THE WEATHER COULD HAVE AN EFFECT ON THEIR MOBILITY AND MORALE THE US ARMY CONDUCTED WINTER CAMPAIGNS AGAINST THE PLAINS TRIBES BECAUSE THEIR SMALLER PONIES COULDN'T BREAST THE SNOW DRIFTS AND THE WARRIORS WERE HUDDLED IN THEIR VILLAGES NOT RIDING ACROSS THE PLAINS AND AVOIDING PURSUIT ICE AND MUD CAN ALSO SLOW DOWN HORSES

AS IT IS WITH THE SIZE AND NUMBER OF SHIPS DABNEYS STORM-WORN HAS AVAILABLE SHE COULD HAVE TRANSPORTED NO MORE THAN DOTHRAKI TO ESTEROS THE LIMITING FACTOR WOULD BE TRANSPORTING THE HORSES EVEN INTO THE LATE CENTURY AN ARMY BEING TRANSPORTED BY SEA COULD LOSE THE MAJORITY OF THE HORSES ABOARD SHIPS THAT IS CERTAINLY NOT SUFFICIENT NUMBERS IF CERASEIN NEGOTIATES A DEAL WITH LORD PROTECTOR OF THE VALE PETER BAALISH AND HE BRINGS HER KNIGHTS THOUGH FEUDAL CUSTOM WOULD LIMIT THIS DEPLOYMENT TO NO MORE THAN DAYS LOGISTICS WOULD ALSO HAVE LIMITED THE SIZE OF THE DOTHRAKI FORCE DABNEYS COULD HAVE BROUGHT TO ESTEROS WINTER IS HERE THE FIELDS ARE HARVESTED GRASS AND WILD GRAINS ARE HIBERNATING OR DYING GRAZING FOR THE DOTHRAKI HORSES WILL BE IN SHORT SUPPLY THE FODDER SUCH AS HAY WILL HAVE BEEN COLLECTED AND STORED SUCH FEED CAN BE EASILY DESTROYED TO PREVENT IT FROM FALLING INTO HANDS OF AN ARMY AND MUCH WOULD BE IN FORTIFIED PLACES MOREOVER GRASS FED HORSE DO NOT TAKE WELL TO GRAIN FEEDS JUST AS GRAIN FED HORSES DON'T DO WELL GRAZING THE DOTHRAKI COULD SOON FIND THEIR HORSES STARVING

THE DOTHRAKI ARE PRETTY MUCH ALL BATTLE HARDENED AND EXPERIENCED KILLERS WHERE THE AVERAGE SOLDIER IN A WESTERMOST ARMY IS A PEASANT WHO HAD A SWORD PUT IN HIS HAND FOR THE FIRST TIME THERE ARE MAYBE A FEW THOUSANDS ACTUAL FIGHTERS IN ESTEROS THAT'S BEING GENEROUS WHO ARE TRAINED AND EVEN WEAR ARMOR SO THE DOTHRAKI WOULDN'T BE FIGHTING THEY WOULD BE FIGHTING SCARED FARMERS PLUS THE ONLY PEOPLE WHO ACTUALLY WEAR ARMOR ARE KNIGHTS AND RICH LORDS THE AVERAGE SOLDIER WEARS WHAT JON HAS PRETTY MUCH NOTHING
THEY ARE BLOODTHIRSTY WARRIORS WHO RIDE AND FIGHT THEIR WHOLE LIFE THE AVERAGE WESTERMOST SOLDIER IS A PEASANT WHO IS FORCED TO FIGHT FOR HIS LORD AND WHO HAS NEVER HOLDEN A WEAPON BEFORE

TECHNICALLY THE STRENGTH OF AN ALCOHOLIC DRINK IS INFLUENCED FIRST BY WHAT KIND OF YEAST IT IS FERMENTED WITH AND ITS SUGAR CONTENTION THE YEAST DIGESTS SUGAR MAKES ETHANOL FROM IT BUT ETHANOL IS TOXIC TO THE YEAST ITSELF SO IF IT REACHES A CERTAIN LEVEL THE YEAST THEMSELVES WILL DIE IF THE SUGAR RUNS OUT THE YEAST WILL HAVE NOTHING TO FERMENT TO ETHANOL

SO NOWADAYS BEERS ARE FERMENTED TO ETHANOL WINES REACH NOWADAYS WITH YOU CAN GO UP TO ETHANOL CONTENTION SO WINES IN ESTEROS CAN BE ANY STRENGTH FROM THESE STAY FRESH IN A HERMETICALLY SEALED CASKET FOR YEARS THEY ARE A GOOD SOURCE OF VITAMINS AND NUTRIENTS IN WINTERS MOST LIKELY ON ESTEROS PEOPLE AVOID SCURVY DURING WINTERS BY DRINKING WINE THEORETICALLY YOU CAN IMAGINE YEAST STRAINS WHICH ENDURE MORE ETHANOL YOU CAN MAKE STRONGER WINES THAT WAY SUGAR CONTENT OF GRAPE JUICE CAN BE INCREASED BY USING DRIED GRAPES SO SUGAR IS NOT A LIMITING FACTOR IN FERMENTATION IF YOU TAKE YOUR TIME TO PRODUCE STRONGER WINE

ON EARTH IF YOU WANT TO INCREASE THE SHELF LIFE OF WINE WHICH WOULD BE A SMART CHOICE WHEN YOU HAVE WINTERS THAT LAST FOR YEARS YOU CAN DISTILL WINE TO BRANDY OR ANY FERMENTED FRUIT JUICE TO PÁLINKA AND ADD THIS TO YOUR WINE EFFECTIVELY INCREASING ITS ETHANOL CONTENT INDEFINITELY WHILE KEEPING MOST OF THE VITAMINS AND OTHER NUTRIENTS NEEDED DURING WINTER THESE FORTIFIED WINES WOULD BE VALUABLE FOR ANY NOBLE HOUSE TO SURVIVE UNTIL SPRING THEY CAN BE OF ANY STRENGTH THEORETICALLY THEY CAN BE MADE TO CONTAIN OF ETHANOL BUT THAT WOULD BE TOTALLY UNNECESSARY FOR INCREASING THIS METHOD IS INDEPENDENT OF SUGAR CONTENT YOU CAN TAKE A LOT OF PRETTY WEAK WINE DISTILL THEM TO BRANDY AND INCREASE THE ETHANOL CONTENT OF WEAK WINE TO ANY LEVEL YOU DESIRE I WOULD WAGER THAT ARMIES TAKE THIS KIND OF PORT WINE WITH THEM ON CAMPAIGNS AS IT CAN BE KEPT WITHOUT SPOILING DURING PRETTY ADVERSE CONDITIONS

WHAT WOULD THE AVERAGE STRENGTH OF WINE BE ON ESTEROS

AGAIN THE VALE IS NOT OF THE NORTHERN IT IS THE MOST ANDAL OF THE KINGDOMS WHERE THE FAITH IS THE STRONGEST THE NORTH IS THE LAST BASTION OF THE FIRST MEN AND WORSHIP THE OLD GODS

THE EXACT MILITARY STRENGTH IS NOT KNOWN BUT IS AROUND KNIGHTS KNIGHTS AS FEUDAL MEN-AT-ARMS HAVE A LIMIT ON THEIR SERVICE TO THEIR LORD USUALLY A PERIOD OF DAYS AFTER WHICH THEY HAVE TO BE PAID OR THEY CAN GO HOME EXCEPT WHEN THE SERVICE IS WITHIN AND IN DEFENSE OF THE VALE ITSELF THIS IS WHY LITTLEFINGER BROUGHT KNIGHTS HE NEEDED TO KEEP THE OTHERS AVAILABLE FOR SERVICE THE SITUATION IN THE NORTH LIMITED THE STRENGTH HE COULD BRING LOGISTICALLY AND THE TIMEFRAME HE COULD BRING THEM TO BATTLE AS IT WOULD TAKE WEEKS TO GO FROM THE VALE THROUGH THE RIVER LANDS ACROSS THE NECK AND ON TO WINTERFELL

THAT MEANS THAT THE KNIGHTS THAT STAYED AT HOME IN THE VALE DID NOT ACCLAIM JON AS KING IN THE NORTHERN LORD BAALISH THE LORD PROTECTOR OF THE VALE IN THE MINORITY OF LORD ROBYN ARLYN DID NOT ACCLAIM JON AS KING IN THE NORTHERN THE COUNCIL DID NOT ACCLAIM JON AS KING IN THE NORTHERN

THIS IS A FEUDAL SOCIETY CERTAINLY RAMSEY BOLTON WAS LORD BOLTON AS HEIR OF HIS FATHER THIS DIDN'T AUTOMATICALLY MAKE HIM LORD PARAMOUNT AND WARDEN OF THE NORTH AS HIS FATHER WAS THIS IS A ROYAL APPOINTMENT SINCE THE TIME OF AEGON THE CONQUEROR TOLMEN WOULD HAVE HAD TO CONFIRM RAMSEY IN THESE OFFICES TO GIVE HIM THAT AUTHORITY AND POWER AS THE MAN IN THE NORTHERN SINCE HE HADN'T BEEN CONFIRMED THE BOB AND HIS EVENTUAL DEATH WAS A SIMPLY FEUDAL SQUABBLE THAT RETURNED THE STARKS TO WINTERFELL AND ELIMINATED THE BOLSONS AT THIS POINT THE STARKS WERE SIMPLY ANOTHER HOUSE IN THE NORTH THEIR TITLE AS LORDS PARAMOUNT AND WARDEN IN THE NORTH HAVING BEEN SURRENDERED ON EXECUTION NO ONE AT THIS POINT IN THE NORTH WAS IN REBELLION TO THE CROWN

WHEN THE NORTHERN HOUSES ACCLAIMED JON AS KING IN THE NORTH AND LEGITIMIZED HIM AS A STARK IN DOING SO THEY ESSENTIALLY CLAIMED INDEPENDENCE FROM THE IRON THRONE IN THE EYES OF THE CROWN WHICH IS NOW CERASEIN THEY ARE IN REBELLION

THE VALE HOWEVER IS NEITHER IN ALLIANCE WITH THE NORTH OR IN REBELLION TO THE CROWN THE LORD PROTECTOR WITH THE ADVICE OF THE COUNCIL IS STILL FREE TO MAKE ALLIANCES HE FACES A FACTION WHICH IS IN FAVOR OF AN ALLIANCE WITH THE NORTHERN BUT THIS FACTION IS NOT POWERFUL ENOUGH AT THIS TIME TO ENDANGER HIS POSITION AND POWER SHOULD MARRIAGE TO TRION BANNISTER BY ANNULLED BY THE FAITH SHE COULD MARRY LORD ROBYN THIS COULD BE BAD FOR LF AS ANSA WOULD NOW COMPETE WITH HIM FOR CONTROL OF LORD ROBYN WITH ALL THE ADVANTAGES MARJORY HAD WITH TOLMEN AND WITH THE KNOWLEDGE OF HIS MURDER OF ALYSA WHICH COULD WRECK HIS SUPPORT IN THE COUNCIL SO HE WILL GET OUT OF WINTERFELL AS SOON AS POSSIBLE TO KEEP CONTROL OF LORD ROBYN AND BLOCK ANY MARRIAGE WITH ANSA

THEN HE CAN SHOP THE KNIGHTS TO THE HIGHEST BIDDER CERASEIN ONCE BEFORE PROMISED HIM LORD PARAMOUNT AND WARDEN IN THE NORTHERN MAYBE SHE PROMISES HIM MORE THE VALE SITS RIGHT ON THE NORTHERN BORDER OF THE CROWN LANDS WITHIN DAYS MARCH OF LANDING WHEN CERASEIN MIGHT HAVE BANNISTER PROFESSIONALS MAYBE BANNISTER AND CROWN LAND LEVIES AND POSSIBLY SOME IRON BORN IF SHE ALLIES WITH EFRON FOR ANY THOSE KNIGHTS COULD END THE WAR QUICKLY MOVING ON LANDING AS SHE MARCHES THROUGH THE STORM LANDS WITH HER UNSULLIED DOTHRAKI TYRELL PROFESSIONAL PIKEMEN AND REACH AND CORNISH LEVIES OF YEA AND THE THREE DRAGONS IF EFRON DIDN'T FIND DRAGONBINDER

IF CERASEIN WINS SHE WILL SEEK TO REUNITE THE SEVEN KINGDOMS UNDER HER RULE DABNEYS STORM-WORN HAS PROMISED THE IRON ISLANDS THEIR INDEPENDENCE THROUGH AARA SUPPORT IT WOULD SEEM SHE IS MAKING ALLIANCE WITH THE NORTHERN JON STARK KING IN THE NORTH CAN OFFER LITTLE AT THIS TIME OTHER THAN TO SECURE THE RIVER LANDS HE CAN ONLY DEPLOY A LIMITED NUMBER OF THE NORTHERN LEVIES AT THIS POINT MOSTLY MANDERLYS AND GLOVERS MAYBE MEN FOR DAYS BUT COORDINATING WITH THE TALLYS IF DEMURE GETS OUT AND GIVEN HIS HATRED OF BAINIE AND THE BANNISTERS THEY CAN SUPPRESS THE FLEYS IN THEIR CURRENT DISORDER WITH WALDER AND HIS TWO OLDEST SONS DEAD WITH DABNEYS IN THE STORM LANDS AND THE REACH AND ADORNE SECURED THE BANNISTERS WOULD BE CUT OFF FROM CARTERLY ROCK AND CONTAINED INSIDE THE CROWN LANDS WITHOUT ROOM TO MANEUVER WHERE DABNEYS CAN FORCE THEM TO BATTLE OR INTO LANDING FOR A SIEGE OTHERWISE THE NORTH HAS LIMITED POWERS TO INTERVENE IN THE WAR PERHAPS JON NEGOTIATES LIMITED SUPPORT AND SUBMISSION FOR AUTONOMY THROUGH HIS MARRIAGE TO DABNEYS

DABNEYS TALKS OF BREAKING THE WHEEL SO SLOWLY BREAKING UP THE SEVEN KINGDOMS WOULD BE AN OUTCOME OF SUCH AN OBJECTIVE UNLESS HER IDEA OF BREAKING THE WHEEL MEANS ELIMINATING ALL THE NOBLE HOUSES THUS ENDING THE STRIFE INDEPENDENCE FOR THE IRON ISLANDS AND AUTONOMY FOR THE NORTH THE VALE AND ADORNE WOULD BE SUCH A PATHOLOGY

JON SNOW IS NOW JON STARK THE ACKNOWLEDGED BASTARD SON OF DARD STARK LEGITIMIZED BY ACCLAMATION BY THE NORTHERN LORDS AS KING IN THE NORTH WHO'S NAME IS STARK AS AND UNACKNOWLEDGED BASTARD SON HE HAS NO LAST NAME AND NO FAMILY RIGHTS TO ANY INHERITANCE IF BIG IF DABNEYS TARGARYAN WERE TO LEGITIMIZE HIM AS A MALE AND AS HER OLDER BROTHER'S SON HE WOULD HAVE A BETTER CLAIM TO THE IRON THRONE IS ANY REALLY READY TO JUST HAND OVER THE THRONE JON DOESN'T WANT THE IRON THRONE HE DIDN'T WANT TO BE KING IN THE NORTHERN BESIDES JUST WHO IS GOING TO BELIEVE BRAN IS THE THREE-EYED RAVEN AND HIS VISION OTHER THAN THE TWO MAIDS WHO WERE WITH PROBABLY WITH DYANNA SHE'S A NOBLE OF A GREAT HOUSE SHE ISN'T GOING TO BE KEEPING HOUSE WITH RHAEGAR BY HERSELF FROM THE KIDNAPPING AND THUS KNOW THAT IT WAS RHAEGAR THAT QUICKENED HER AND THAT THE BABY THEY GAVE NED STARK IS SON NO ONE ELSE REALLY KNOWS HOWLAND REED WAS BADLY WOUNDED AND WAS SOON IN SHOCK AND BLEEDING OUT WHILE NED WAS IN THE DOJ NO WAY HOWLAND MAKES IT UP THE STAIRS HE MAY NOT EVEN HAVE BEEN CONSCIOUS WHEN NED CAME BACK DOWN THE STAIRS WITH THE BABY AND THE TWO MAIDS HE'D WAKE UP THERE WOULD BE THE TWO MAIDS AND NED AND THE BABY HE COULD CONJECTURE THAT NED PICKED UP THE BABY AT THE DOJ BUT IF HE WAS UNDER FOR A COUPLE DAYS HE WOULDN'T KNOW FOR SURE AND NED COULD TELL HIM HE HAD GONE AND PICKED UP THE BABY FROM ITS MOTHER AND HIRED THE WOMEN TO ATTEND WOUND AND THE BABY IF THE MAIDS ARE STILL ALIVE AND I DOUBT NED WOULD KILL THEM HE PROBABLY BROUGHT THEM NORTH WITH THE BABY AND SETTLED THEM NEAR WINTERFELL TO KEEP AN EYE ON THEM THEY MIGHT CONFIRM VISION OTHERWISE IT WOULD BE BEST FOR EVERYONE IF BRAN JUST KEPT HIS MOUTH SHUT
